Swamp Stride.name: Swamp Stride
Swamp Stride.description:
&Reference[Difficult Terrain] caused by swampy terrain doesn’t cost the [[lookup @name]] extra movement.

The [[lookup @name]] has a +3 bonus to Stealth checks made in swamps.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) is available to be enabled in the Effects tab of this actor sheet.

+3 Stealth Check.name: +3 Stealth Check
+3 Stealth Check.description: The creature has a +3 bonus to Stealth checks made in swamps.

Gnomish Cunning.name: Gnomish Cunning
Gnomish Cunning.description: The [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that began the combat surprised.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The Child of Belcorra uses [[/item .5VlVFK5Rc2ADChrC]] and makes one [[/item .4frM1mB52j0b7BlB]] attack.

Breathtaking Glare.name: Breathtaking Glare
Breathtaking Glare.description:
The [[lookup @name]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] they can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet of them. If the target can see the Child, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]].

Failure: The target can’t breathe or speak. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name]]'s Breathtaking Glare for the next 24 hours.

affects.special: Affected by the creature's Breathtaking Glare

Breathtaking Glare.name: Breathtaking Glare
Breathtaking Glare.description: The creature can’t breathe or speak. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Rotting Fist.name: 腐朽拳击
Rotting Fist.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed.

While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse.

A creature dies and decays into a foul-smelling sludge if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 若你为生物，则你被诅咒。受诅咒期间，你无法恢复生命值，也无法在完成长休时恢复生命值上限，并且诅咒每持续 24 小时，你生命值上限降低 [[/r 3d6#减少最大生命值]]{10 (3d6)}。若你因此攻击生命值降至 0，则你立即死亡并化为尘土。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name]] casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .EtEgRdgwmc2jSc1j]]{Druidcraft}, [[/item .UWqa2I78Yx2JjBt7]]{Poison Spray} (2d12 Poison damage), [[/item .NNq6IVhB06bNb27b]]{Produce Flame} (2d8 Fire damage)

2/Day Each: [[/item .XDe7QPecfzzVhjkw]]{Barkskin}, [[/item .iuGiDuZrKTjDKf51]]{Entangle}, [[/item .1ZqBVOWrOTaOdMZn]]{Faerie Fire}, [[/item .jdLOKZmG6rmontp0]]{Meld into Stone}, [[/item .2jTSc3eMdyo3SAxz]]{Moonbeam}, [[/item .MVCymniq01Qf7RPj]]{Pass Without Trace}, [[/item .g9s4GEPVxocCcMn8]]{Plant Growth}, [[/item .AIIn8PZ7Pe69O7Mr]]{Protection from Energy}, [[/item .SXuHVkhSXO17posY]]{Spike Growth}

1/Day Each: [[/item .aYRmAKQ9TiVXQEEp]]{Conjure Minor Elementals}, [[/item .GLyJ83o0J9CWmTFN]]{Freedom of Movement}

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Poison Spray.name: 毒气喷溅
Poison Spray.description:
你向施法距离内一个你可见的生物喷出一股毒气。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标将受 [[/damage 1d12 type=poison]]伤害。

戏法强化： 到达特定等级后，此戏法的伤害将增加 1d12：5 级（2d12）、11 级（3d12）、17 级（4d12）。

Produce Flame.name: 燃火术
Produce Flame.description:
一朵摇曳的火焰出现在你手中并火焰在法术持续时间存在。火焰在你手中期间，不会散发任何热量也不会点燃任何东西，发出半径 20 尺明亮光照，以及额外 20 尺微光光照。你再次施展该法术时，法术终止。

直到法术结束为止，你可以用一个魔法动作向距你 60 尺内的一名生物或一个物件丢出火焰。进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到 1d8 点火焰伤害。

戏法强化： 你到达特定等级时，其伤害增加 1d8（5 级 2d8、11 级 3d8、17 级 4d8）。

Barkskin.name: 树肤
Barkskin.description: 你触碰一个自愿生物。直到法术终止前，目标的皮肤呈现出树皮样的外貌，并且若目标 AC 低于 17，则其 AC 变为 17。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Meld into Stone.name: 融身入石
Meld into Stone.description:
你进入一个足以完全容纳你身体的石料物件或石料表面内，使你自己和你携带的所有装备在法术持续时间内与石料融为一体。你必须触碰该石料来做到这件事。此后，任何非魔法的感官都无法看到或侦测到你的存在。

与石料融合后，你看不到外界发生了什么，并且你为了聆听外界声音而进行的任何感知（[[/check ability=wis skill=prc]]{察觉}）检定都具有劣势。与石头融合时，你仍能感觉到时间的流逝，也可以对自己施展法术。你无法移动，但可以消耗 5 尺移动力从进入石头的地方离开石内，法术随之终止。

石头所受的轻微损伤不会对你造成伤害，不过石头部分损毁或者形状改变时（改变到不再适合容纳你的程度），会将你从石中排挤出并对你造成[[/damage 6d6 type=force]]伤害。石头完全损毁（或材质改变）时，也会将你从石中排挤出并对你造成 [[/damage 50 type=force]]伤害。被排挤出石头时，你移动至距离第一次进入石头处最近的一处未被占据的空间位置，并陷入&Reference[prone]{倒地}状态。

Moonbeam.name: 月华之光
Moonbeam.description:
指定施法距离内一点，一束淡淡的银光照耀在以该点为中心半径 5 尺、高 40 尺的柱状区域内。直至法术终止前，柱状区域内处于微光光照。在施展该法术的后续回合内，你能够以一个魔法动作将柱状区域移动至多 60 尺。柱状区域出现时，每个区域内的生物进行一次体质豁免检定，豁免失败则受到 2d10 的光耀伤害，且若该生物已变形（例如受法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{变形术} 影响），其变回真实形态，且无法在离开柱状区域前变形。豁免成功则仅承受前述伤害的一半。在法术区域进入生物空间、生物进入法术区域或在其内结束回合时，目标生物也需要进行该体质豁免检定。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免检定。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比二环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d10。

Pass without Trace.name: 行动无踪
Pass without Trace.description: 你在法术持续时间于 30 尺光环范围内散发出遮蔽灵光。位于灵光范围期间，你和每名你选择的生物在敏捷（[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]{隐匿}）检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Concealed.name: 隐蔽
Concealed.description: 你和每名被施法者选择的生物在[[/check ability=dex skill=ste]]检定上获得 +10 加值，且不会留下任何踪迹。

Plant Growth.name: Plant Growth
Plant Growth.description:
施法时间：动作 (繁茂) 或 8 小时(丰产)

该法术将活力引导给特定区域中的植物。本法术的施法时间取决于你选择下述效应之一：繁茂或丰产。

繁茂。 你指定施法距离内一点，以该点为中心 100 尺半径的球状范围内的普通植物将变的粗壮繁茂。一名穿过该区域的生物每移动 1 尺必须花费 4 尺移动力。你可以在该法术范围内空出一块或多块任意大小的区域，将其排除在法术效应影响之外。

丰产。 你指定施法距离内一点，距该点半里内的植物的产量将在 365 日内被强化。这些植物收获时将产出两倍于正常产量的作物。这些植物每年仅能从一道植物滋长中获益。

Protection from Energy.name: 防护能量
Protection from Energy.description: 法术持续时间内，你触及的一名自愿生物具有你选择的一种伤害类型的&Reference[resistance]{抗性}：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、雷鸣。

Spike Growth.name: 荆棘丛生
Spike Growth.description: 以施法距离内一点为中心周围 20 尺半径的球状区域扭曲变形，大片坚硬的棘刺破土而出。该区域在法术持续时间内视为困难地形。而生物进入该区域或在其中移动时，其每移动 5 尺就要受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=piercing]]伤害。法术导致的地面变形经过伪装，使其看起来并无异样。如果生物在你施展此法术时看不见这片区域，则它只有在执行一次&Reference[search]{搜索}动作并成功进行一次感知（[[/check ability=wis skill=prc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]{察觉}或 [[/check ability=wis skill=sur dc=@attributes.spell.dc]]{求生}）检定后，才能在进入之前发现该区域隐藏的危险。

Conjure Minor Elementals.name: 咒唤微元素群
Conjure Minor Elementals.description:
你在持续时间内将来自元素位面的精魂咒唤在你身周 15 尺光环区域内，让它们环绕着你飞舞。直到法术结束为止，你进行的任何攻击检定命中光环区域内的生物时，都会额外造成 2d8 点伤害。额外伤害的类型为强酸、寒冷、火焰或闪电的一种（在你发动攻击时选择）。

此外，光环区域内的地面对你的敌人而言是&Reference[DifficultTerrain]{困难地形}。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比四环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Freedom of Movement.name: 行动自如
Freedom of Movement.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物，并使目标在法术持续时间内移动时不受&Reference[DifficultTerrain]{困难地形}限制，并且任何法术或其他魔法效应都不能降低目标的速度，或者使目标陷入&Reference[Paralyzed apply=false]{麻痹}或 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]{束缚}状态。目标还会获得等同于其速度的游泳速度。

此外，该目标还可以花费 5 尺移动力直接从非魔法的束缚物中挣脱（诸如镣铐或其他生物对其施加的&Reference[grappled apply=false]{受擒}状态）。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比四环高一环，你就可以额外再指定一名生物作为此法术的目标。

Foundry Note

施展行动提供的主动效应会将角色的游泳速度升级为“1”（使之与行走速度等同），同时赋予状态免疫效应。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The irlgaunt casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMeldintoSt], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplStoneShape]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The irlgaunt makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and two [[/item Stomp]] attacks.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Regurgitate Gastrolith.name: Regurgitate Gastrolith
Regurgitate Gastrolith.description:
The irlgaunt regurgitates a clot of stone and digestive enzymes.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the irlgaunt can see within 30 feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]].

Success: Half damage.

Stone Step.name: Stone Step
Stone Step.description: Difficult Terrain caused by rocks or stone doesn’t cost the irlgaunt extra movement.

Meld into Stone.name: 融身入石
Meld into Stone.description:
你进入一个足以完全容纳你身体的石料物件或石料表面内，使你自己和你携带的所有装备在法术持续时间内与石料融为一体。你必须触碰该石料来做到这件事。此后，任何非魔法的感官都无法看到或侦测到你的存在。

与石料融合后，你看不到外界发生了什么，并且你为了聆听外界声音而进行的任何感知（[[/check ability=wis skill=prc]]{察觉}）检定都具有劣势。与石头融合时，你仍能感觉到时间的流逝，也可以对自己施展法术。你无法移动，但可以消耗 5 尺移动力从进入石头的地方离开石内，法术随之终止。

石头所受的轻微损伤不会对你造成伤害，不过石头部分损毁或者形状改变时（改变到不再适合容纳你的程度），会将你从石中排挤出并对你造成[[/damage 6d6 type=force]]伤害。石头完全损毁（或材质改变）时，也会将你从石中排挤出并对你造成 [[/damage 50 type=force]]伤害。被排挤出石头时，你移动至距离第一次进入石头处最近的一处未被占据的空间位置，并陷入&Reference[prone]{倒地}状态。

Stone Shape.name: 塑石术
Stone Shape.description: 你触碰一个体积为中型或更小的石质物件或某块岩石在任何方向都不超过 5 尺的一部分，并将其塑造成你想要的任意形状。例如你可以将一块大石头塑造成一件武器、一尊塑像、或一个保险箱，也可以在石墙上开出一条小通道，前提是墙的厚度不能超过 5 尺。你也可以使一扇石门或石质门框变形来将门封死。你创造的物件最多可以有两条铰链和一道闩，除此之外不能以该法术塑造出更复杂的机械结构。

Strength Drain.name: Strength Drain
Strength Drain.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target’s Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 身处微光光照或黑暗，其执行 &Reference[Hide] 动作。

Steal Shadow.name: Steal Shadow
Steal Shadow.description:
Trigger: The assassin’s [[/item Strength Drain]] reduces a creature’s Strength score to 3 or lower.

Response: The assassin pulls the target’s shadow free of its body. The shadow animates as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow}, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the creature. The shadow is under the assassin’s control and acts immediately after the assassin’s turn.

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the assassin has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that began the encounter &Reference[surprise]{surprised}. Any hit the assassin scores against such a creature is a Critical Hit.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The assassin deals an extra [[/damage 4d6 average]] damage when they hit a target with an attack and has Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and the assassin doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Sunlight Weakness.name: 日光弱点
Sunlight Weakness.description: While in sunlight, the assassin has Disadvantage on D20 tests.

Unarmed Strike.name: Unarmed Strike
Unarmed Strike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Camouflage.name: 伪装
Camouflage.description: Murschen’s skin changes color and pattern to blend into his surroundings. He has Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to Hide, provided most of his body is uncovered.

Red Ruin Stance.name: Red Ruin Stance
Red Ruin Stance.description:
Murschen can deal Slashing damage with his Unarmed Strike attack.

Foundry Note

[[/item Unarmed Strike]] allows you to choose the damage type when rolling it.

Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch
Sucker Punch.description:
Murschen deals an extra 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) damage when he hits a target with an Unarmed Strike attack and has Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Murschen that doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and Murschen doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Foundry Note

The [[/item Unarmed Strike]] feature includes a Sucker Punch attack which includes the extra damage.

Unarmored Defense.name: 无甲防御
Unarmored Defense.description: While Murschen isn’t wearing armor or wielding a Shield, his Armor Class equals 10 plus his Dexterity and Wisdom modifier (included in AC).

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Murschen makes three [[/item Unarmed Strike]] and [[/item Dart]] attacks in any combination.

Dread Wisp.name: Dread Wisp
Dread Wisp.description:
Will-o’-wisps native to the Darklands are more ominous and malevolent than those that bob about in the lonely marshes and surfaces of the upper world. These dread wisps instill terror with eerie shifts of light and consume the fear they create, drawing life energy from their victims in the process. While dread wisps can survive anywhere in the Darklands, they prefer moist areas like partially submerged caves, the banks of underground rivers, and towering fungus gardens.

Dread wisps don’t glow as brightly as surface will-o’-wisps because even the dimmest light attracts notice underground. Long-lived and hateful creatures, they remember vivid details about their lives, travels, and most delicious prey. Although dread wisps could share extensive lore and unique experiences, they don’t, as they find amusement in others’ ignorance.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Enervating Arc]] attacks.

Enervating Arc.name: Enervating Arc
Enervating Arc.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] scores a Critical Hit, the target also gains 1 level of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false].

Exhaustion.name: 力竭
Exhaustion.description: If the wisp scores a Critical Hit, the target also gains 1 level of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false].

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and their light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until the wisp’s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack roll or uses Consume Despair.

Shadow Flitter.name: Shadow Flitter
Shadow Flitter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to a space they can see within 30 feet that is in Dim Light or Darkness.

Consume Despair.name: Consume Despair
Consume Despair.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1sXZOs9UlLvdJ9v4]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=1sXZOs9UlLvdJ9v4]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that has at least 1 level of Exhaustion.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

save.condition: If one creature is within 5 feet of the wisp that has at least 1 level of Exhaustion

Unnerving Flickering.name: Unnerving Flickering
Unnerving Flickering.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional number of feet equal to the radius.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can alter the radius as an action.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=gQwDnmLGysVDOmOY]], any creature that ends its turn in the Bright Light.

Failure: The creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: The creature is immune to Unnerving Flickering for 24 hours.

Foundry Note

By default, the token light radius is set at 5-feet bright light and 10-feet dim light.

save.condition: Any creature that ends its turn in the Bright Light.

affects.special: Any creature that ends its turn in the Bright Light

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。

Ephemeral.name: 转瞬即逝
Ephemeral.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法着装或携带任何东西。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Chandriu Invisar.name: Chandriu Invisar
Chandriu Invisar.description:
Chandriu was once the administrator of Belcorra’s scriptorium and a drow of surpassing intellect. She died in despair over rejection from Belcorra’s apprentice, Volluk. She now haunts her scriptorium as a ghost.

Chandriu can usually be found in area C36.

Anchoring Obsession.name: Anchoring Obsession
Anchoring Obsession.description: Chandriu’s obsession with Volluk binds her to the scriptorium, and she can’t leave areas C36 and C37. She can be put to rest by reducing her to 0 Hit Points after convincing her to give up on Volluk with a successful DC 15 Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, or Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, Chandriu still attacks but she can’t take Reactions and her Speed is halved for 1 minute.

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: Chandriu can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: Chandriu can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. She takes [[/damage average]] damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: Chandriu enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. She is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but she can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Despairing Cry.name: Despairing Cry
Despairing Cry.description:
Chandriu wails in despair, calling out Volluk’s name. Each creature that can hear Chandriu in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MpdenNwYc2QBrqAb]]-foot Emanation originating from her is subjected to the following effect.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=MpdenNwYc2QBrqAb]], creatures immune to the Frightened condition automatically succeed on the save.

Failure: The creature is slowed until the end of its next turn. While slowed, the creature can’t take Reactions, its Speed is halved, and it can’t make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both.

Success: The creature is immune to Chandriu’s Despairing Cry for 1 minute.

Foundry Note

An Active Effect (AE) can be applied to a target, reducing their speed by half. This AE also serves as a reminder for the previously mentioned consequences and does not provide any additional automation.

Slowed.name: 缓速
Slowed.description: The creature is slowed until the end of its next turn. While slowed, the creature can’t take Reactions, its Speed is halved, and it can’t make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Chandriu uses [[/item .EM60gWIu5y8wI6hY]] and makes two [[/item .5uQASrsReGYf8a2C]] attacks.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The dhuthorex casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBestowCurs] (level 5 version), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConfusion0]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplContactOth]{Contact Other Plane}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 16).

Aquatic Ambush.name: Aquatic Ambush
Aquatic Ambush.description: If the dhuthorex is underwater and hidden from a creature within 20 feet of them, the dhuthorex Swims up to 20 feet and makes a [[/item Bite]] attack against that creature. The dhuthorex has Advantage on the attack roll.

Wavesense.name: Wavesense
Wavesense.description: The dhuthorex can’t use their Tremorsense outside of water.

Bestow Curse.name: 降咒
Bestow Curse.description:
你触碰一名生物。该生物必须进行一次感知豁免并成功通过，否则将在法术持续时间内被诅咒。直到诅咒终止前，目标会遭受以下一项效应，由你选择：

  • 选择一项属性。目标使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。 （诅咒属性效应）
  • 目标对你发动的攻击检定具有劣势。 （诅咒攻击效应）
  • 在战斗中，目标在其每回合开始时必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则在该回合中被迫执行 &Reference[Dodge]{回避}动作。 （诅咒行动效应）
  • 若你的攻击检定或法术对目标造成了伤害，则目标还会额外受到 1d8 暗蚀伤害。 （诅咒韧性效应）。

升环施法：使用四环法术位施展此法术时，你可以维持此法术的专注至多 10 分钟。使用五环及更高环阶的法术位施展此法术时，此法术无需专注，并且持续时间变为 8 小时（5～6 环法术位）或 24 小时（7～8 环法术位）。若你使用 9 环法术位施展此法术，则此法术会一直持续到被解除为止。

Cursed Charisma.name: 诅咒魅力
Cursed Charisma.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Constitution.name: 诅咒体质
Cursed Constitution.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Dexterity.name: 诅咒敏捷
Cursed Dexterity.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Intelligence.name: 诅咒智力
Cursed Intelligence.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Strength.name: 诅咒力量
Cursed Strength.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Wisdom.name: 诅咒感知
Cursed Wisdom.description: 你使用该属性所进行的属性检定和豁免检定具有劣势。

Cursed Attacks.name: 诅咒攻击
Cursed Attacks.description: 你对施加者发动的攻击检定具有劣势。

Cursed Actions.name: 诅咒动作
Cursed Actions.description: 在战斗中，你在你的每回合开始时必须进行一次[[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]]，豁免失败则在该回合中被迫执行&Reference[Dodge]动作。

Cursed Resilience.name: 诅咒活力
Cursed Resilience.description: 若施加者的攻击检定或法术对你造成了伤害，则你还会额外受到[[/damage 1d8 type=necrotic]]伤害。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
在施法距离内一处边长 30 尺的立方区域内创造出一个在空中舞动旋转的彩色图纹。图纹在出现片刻后消失，然后迫使区域内每个看到它的生物进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

如果受术生物受到任何伤害，或有其他生物用动作将其从恍惚中摇醒，则其身上的此效应将提前终止。

Hypnotized.name: 催眠
Hypnotized.description: 你在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dhuthorex uses [[/item Frightful Presence]] then makes two attacks: one with their [[/item Bite]] or [[/item Snout]] and one with their [[/item Tentacle]].

Snout.name: Snout
Snout.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 16.

Failure: The dhuthorex pushes the target up to 10 feet or gives them the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition (dhuthorex’s choice).

Frightful Presence.name: 骇人威仪
Frightful Presence.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature of the dhuthorex’s choice in a 120-foot Emanation originating from the dhuthorex.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the creature repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Success: The target is immune to this dhuthorex’s Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

Confusion.name: 困惑术
Confusion.description:
你选择施法距离内一点为中心，半径10尺球状区域内的每名生物必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则目标不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在其每个回合开始时掷1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比四环高一环，此法术的球状区域半径就增加5尺。

Confused.name: 困惑
Confused.description:
目标不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在其每个回合开始时掷1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.tables.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

Contact Other Plane.name: 异界探知
Contact Other Plane.description:
你与一名半神、一名古老贤者的亡魂或是其他位面的博学实体建立了精神的连接。与超越人智存在的连接可能会破坏你的心智。当你施展该法术时，进行一次 DC15 的智力豁免。豁免成功时，你可以询问该实体最多五个问题。你必须在法术结束前提出你的问题。DM 将以一个单词回答你的每个问题，例如“是Yes”、“不是No”、“可能Maybe”、“不可能Never”、“无关Irrelevant”或“不清楚Unclear”（意味着该实体不知道该问题的答案）。如果一个单词的答案会造成误解，DM可能会用一句短语作为答案。

豁免失败时，你将受到6d6心灵伤害并且直到你完成一次长休为止，你陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated] 状态。对你施展法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterRes]{高等复原术} 将结束该效应。

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
一名法术范围内你可见的类人必须成功于一次感知豁免，否则在持续时间内陷入 &Reference[Charmed apply=false] 状态。若你或你的盟友正在与其战斗，则目标在此豁免上具有优势。目标受到伤害时，可以重复进行豁免，豁免成功则其身上的此法术终止。

该目标被魅惑期间，只要你与其处于同一位面就可以与之保持心灵感应。在你的回合，你可以通过心灵感应命令该生物（无需动作），比如“攻击那个生物”“跑到那个位置”或是“去拿那个物品”。目标完成一项指令却未收到你的进一步指示时，将会凭自身喜好行动，尽可能的保护自己。

你可以用自己的反应去要求目标执行一项反应

升环施法： 使用更高环阶法术位施展时，你的专注能持续更长时间，六环至多 10 分钟，七环至多 1 小时，八环及以上至多 8 小时。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] ，当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Dream.name: 托梦术
Dream.description:
你指定一名你知道且与你同处一个存在位面的生物。你或一名被你触碰的自愿生物将作为信使进入出神状态。该状态下，信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使以可怕的形象出现。但此时信使只能提供不超过十个单词的信息，随后目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标便无法从休息中获益，并在其醒来时受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: 出神状态
Trance State.description: 信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

Scrying.name: Scrying
Scrying.description:
你能看见和听见一个和你处于同一存在位面上的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免；该豁免的调整值与你对目标的了解程度有关（见下文），也与你和目标之间的物理联系程度有关。目标不知道它进行此豁免在对抗什么，只是会感觉不自在。

你对目标的了解有… 豁免调整值
二手信息（你曾经听说过目标） +5
直接信息（你曾经见过目标） +0
熟悉（你对目标很了解） −5
你持有目标的… 豁免调整值
肖像或其他图像 −2
衣物或其他物品 −4
身体部位如头发或指甲 −10

如果对方豁免成功，则目标不受该法术影响，并且在 24 小时内你不能尝试探知同一个目标。

如果对方豁免失败，则你在目标身边 10 尺内创造出一个隐形的传感器。通过传感器，你可以身临其境地看见和听见周围的环境。传感器会跟随目标移动，并在法术持续时间内始终保持在目标 10 尺之内。在能够看到传感器的生物眼中，你的传感器是一个拳头大小的光球。

除生物之外，你也可以选择一个你以前见过的地点作为该法术的目标。这种情况下，传感器会出现在目标地点且不会移动。

materials.value: 一个至少价值 1000GP 的法器，例如水晶球、银镜、圣水盆

affects.special: 与你处于同一位面的生物，或某个你曾见过的地点的生物

Telekinesis.name: 心灵遥控
Telekinesis.description:
你获得以思想移动或操纵生物或物件的能力。你施展法术时或在法术终止前的其后回合中用一个魔法动作，你可以向施法距离内可见的一名生物或一个物件伸展你的意志，造成对应的下述效应。你可以一轮接一轮地影响同一个目标，也可以在任何时候选择一个新的目标。如果你改变了目标，则之前的目标将不再受该法术影响。

生物。 你可以尝试移动一名巨型或更小的生物。目标必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以将其往任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。在你的下个回合结束前，该生物陷入 &Reference[Restrained] 状态，而被你举到空中的生物会在半空中悬停。除非你再次使用此选项且目标失败于豁免，否则被举到空中的生物会在你的下个回合结束坠落。

物件。 你可以尝试移动一个巨型或更小的物件。如果该物品没有被着装或携带，则你可以自动使它朝任何方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

如果该物件已被一名生物着装或携带，则那名生物必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则你可以把目标物件从该生物身上拿走，并且使该物体朝任意方向移动 30 尺，但不能让它离开施法距离。

你可以使用心灵遥控对物体进行精密操作，例如操纵一件简单的工具，打开一扇门或一个容器，把东西放进或拿出一个打开的容器中，或是把一个小瓶子里的东西倒出来。

Dragon's Blood Puffball.name: Dragon's Blood Puffball
Dragon's Blood Puffball.description: This bulbous fungus looks like a huge, decaying rose. It releases spores that cause a painful psychic dissonance in sentient creatures.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The puffball makes two attacks.

Spore Jet.name: Spore Jet
Spore Jet.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be subjected to [[/item Brain Burn Poison]].

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes in a burst of poisonous spores when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=drRnMRHgrgXDkzxL]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=drRnMRHgrgXDkzxL]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature is subjected to [[/item Brain Burn Poison]].

Success: Half damage only.

Brain Burn Poison.name: Brain Burn Poison
Brain Burn Poison.description:
A creature subjected to Brain Burn poison makes a [[/save format=long]] at the end of each of its turns.

On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage. On a success, the effect ends.

save.condition: If subjected to Brain Burn poison

Morlock Cultist.name: Morlock Cultist
Morlock Cultist.description:
Originating from humans long lost from the world of light, morlocks dwell in the upper reaches of the Darklands. Their wiry frames mask the strength of their limbs, and their arms are long enough that they can drop into an uncanny, four-limbed shuffle for speed or stealth.

Morlock Cultist

Morlocks who serve as priests in their conclaves usually dabble in eerie occult magic.

Swarming Stance.name: Swarming Stance
Swarming Stance.description: [[lookup @name]] can occupy the same space as another willing creature with this trait. While they share a creature’s space in this way, [[lookup @name]] makes melee attack rolls with Advantage.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Scuttling Spell.name: Scuttling Spell
Scuttling Spell.description: [[lookup @name]] moves up to half their Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks]. During this movement, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] doesn’t cost [[lookup @name]] extra movement. [[lookup @name]] then uses [[/item Spellcasting]].

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name]] casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .bshZxwFh4oSEpAnK]]{Minor Illusion}, [[/item .9i1eC5tbgzi29XKQ]]{Eldritch Blast}

1/Day Each: [[/item .7AJHfbHVEIZdLwkD]]{Charm Person}, [[/item .fGkDQkoKMlkDkDxa]]{Hellish Rebuke}, [[/item .wcj7WDzAVwCN7svC]]{Mirror Image}, [[/item .smFDLevNl3tM7EJ8]]{Shatter}

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Eldritch Blast.name: Eldritch Blast
Eldritch Blast.description:
你释放出一束爆裂能量射线，对施法距离内一名生物或一个物件发动一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标将受 [[/damage 1d10 type=force]]伤害。

戏法强化：到达 5 级后此法术将创造出两条射线，11 级后三条，17 级后四条。你可以使这些射线攻击同一个目标或分别攻击不同的目标。你需要为每条射线分别进行攻击检定。

[[(floor((@details.level+1)/6)+1)]]{射线总数}

Charm Person.name: 魅惑类人
Charm Person.description:
选择法术距离内你可见的一名类人生物，迫使该生物进行一次感知豁免，如果你或者你的同伴正在与其战斗，其进行的这次豁免将具有优势。如果其豁免失败，其陷入&Reference[charmed]状态直到法术结束，或者直到你或你的同伴对其造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对你友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道其曾被你魅惑。

升环施法：使用的法术位每高一环，你就可以额外选择一个生物作为目标。

Charmed.name: 魅惑
Charmed.description: 目标陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态直到法术结束，或者直到施法者或施法者的同伴对它造成伤害。被魅惑的生物将对施法者友好。在法术结束时，生物会知道它曾被施法者魅惑。

Hellish Rebuke.name: 炼狱叱喝
Hellish Rebuke.description:
伤害你的生物立刻被绿色的烈焰席卷。该生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 2d10 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法： 使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

activation.condition: 当你受到来自 60 尺内你可见生物的伤害时执行

Mirror Image.name: 镜影术
Mirror Image.description:
三个你自身的幻象分身出现在你的位置上。直到法术终止前，分身都会随你移动，并模仿你的动作和位置变换，使人无法追踪判断哪一个是你的真身。

在法术持续时间内，每当一个生物攻击命中你时， [[/r (@flags.dnd-players-handbook.mirrorImages)d6kh1cs>2#Duplicate destroyed]]{为每个剩余分身投掷一个 1d6} ，只要有任一 d6 骰出 3 或以上，一个分身代你承受本次命中并随之被摧毁。分身无视所有其他的伤害和效应。三个分身都被摧毁时，法术随之结束。

如果一个生物处于 &Reference[blinded apply=false] 状态，或拥有 &Reference[blindsight] 或 &Reference[truesight]。

Shatter.name: 粉碎音波
Shatter.description:
A loud noise erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered there makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 3d8 Thunder damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A Construct has Disadvantage on the save.

A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the spell's area.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 2.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) to enable in the Effects tab that applies disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Augrael has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Deepwater Dhuthorex.name: Deepwater Dhuthorex
Deepwater Dhuthorex.description: The typical dhuthorex is a hungry and thoughtless beast, chasing prey through the depths and venturing onto land only to pursue easy prey.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dhuthorex makes two attacks: one with their [[/item Bite]] or [[/item Snout]], and one with their [[/item Tentacle]].

Snout.name: Snout
Snout.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mQbR0q9X9zd8XpU0]].

Failure: The dhuthorex pushes the target up to 10 feet or gives them the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition (dhuthorex’s choice).

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 15).

Aquatic Ambush.name: Aquatic Ambush
Aquatic Ambush.description:
If the dhuthorex is underwater and hidden from a creature within 20 feet of them, the dhuthorex Swims up to 20 feet and makes a [[/item Bite]] attack against that creature.

The dhuthorex has Advantage on the attack roll.

Wavesense.name: Wavesense
Wavesense.description: The dhuthorex can’t use their Tremorsense outside of water.

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Bite]] attack they are grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the Grapple ends.

While swallowed, the target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone} in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=uygphpszavIkHznS]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using [[lookup @range.value activity=uygphpszavIkHznS]] feet of movement, exiting &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Save: 20+ Damage.name: Save: 20+ Damage
Save: 20+ Damage.condition: If the dhuthorex takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature

Damage: While Swallowed.name: Damage: While Swallowed
Damage: While Swallowed.condition: If a creature is swallowed by the gug

Escape Corpse.name: 逃离尸体
Escape Corpse.condition: Must use 10 feet of movement to escape

Swallowed.name: 吞下
Swallowed.description: While swallowed, the target is &Reference[blinded apply=false]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained apply=false]{restrained}, it has &Reference[total cover] against attacks and other effects outside the creature.

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: A swallowed creature escaping the stomach lands &Reference[prone apply=false]{prone}.

Barcumbuk.name: Barcumbuk
Barcumbuk.description:
Barcumbuk is a skilled erinyes smith working for the contract devil Urevian. He prefers to produce weapons of high quality, taking his time, and he chafes at Urevian’s demands that he work quickly.

Barcumbuk usually works in the hellforge (area G5) on the fifth level of the Abomination Vaults.

Diabolical Restoration.name: 魔鬼复苏
Diabolical Restoration.description: If [[lookup @name]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name]]为抵抗法术和其它魔法效应而作的豁免检定具有优势。

Hellforged Warhammer +1.name: Hellforged Warhammer +1
Hellforged Warhammer +1.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]  or [[/damage twoHanded average]] damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name]] makes three attacks, one of which must be a [[/item Light Hammer]] attack.

Bouncing Slam.name: Bouncing Slam
Bouncing Slam.description:
The gibtas jumps up to half its Speed into a space occupied by another creature.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 14.

Failure: The creature is pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space of the gibtas’s choice and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: The gibtas bounces into the nearest unoccupied space of the creature’s choice.

Bouncing Reposition.name: Bouncing Reposition
Bouncing Reposition.description:
Trigger: A creature the gibtas can see moves into a space within 10 feet of it.

Response: The gibtas jumps up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The gibtas has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Standing Leap.name: 立定起跳
Standing Leap.description: The gibtas’s Long Jump is up to 30 feet and its High Jump is up to 15 feet with or without a running start.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The gibtas uses [[/item Bouncing Slam]] and makes a [[/item Bite]] attack.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Spit.name: Spit
Spit.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target takes an additional [[/damage activity=qfiGMwdYOd8NJJG0 average]] at the end of its next turn.

damage.condition: At the end of the target's next turn

Bright Walker.name: Bright Walker
Bright Walker.description:
Those who have encountered calignis (page 229) quickly learn that their method of death involves burning out instead of bleeding out. At times, this dramatic immolation is denied to a caligni and they arise as an undead bright walker. This moniker is a bit of a misnomer, because these undead don’t walk; they instead float a few inches above the ground. Though tied to caligni society, bright walkers don’t understand that their glow damages and repels living calignis.

Most calignis assume that bright walkers arise at the whims of their capricious demigods, the Forsaken, but as the Forsaken are denied the souls of these undead, some other unknown force must be involved.

Bright Release.name: Bright Release
Bright Release.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes in a bright flash of light [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Creatures with Sunlight Sensitivity make the save with Disadvantage.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: Magical Darkness that overlaps with the Emanation is dispelled.

Brilliant Illumination.name: Brilliant Illumination
Brilliant Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 60-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 60 feet. The bright walker can suppress or reignite this light as a Bonus Action.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Landbound.name: Landbound
Landbound.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t fly higher than a foot above the ground. If they fly higher than this distance, they fall but don’t take damage from falling.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .RV6FEJZ0Wspq5BV1]] attacks or two [[/item .xs0eHq5svLGXMmln]] attacks.

Radiant Ray.name: 光耀射线
Radiant Ray.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

On a Critical Hit, the target also has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Critical Hit: Blinded.name: Critical Hit: Blinded
Critical Hit: Blinded.description: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Reignite.name: Reignite
Reignite.description:
If the bright walker’s Brilliant Illumination is suppressed, the bright walker reignites it with a blast of heat and light.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot Emanation originating from the bright walker. Creatures with Sunlight Sensitivity make the save with Disadvantage.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature has the Blinded condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: Magical Darkness that overlaps with this area is dispelled.

Shadow Jump.name: Shadow Jump
Shadow Jump.description: If the bright walker’s Brilliant Illumination is suppressed, the bright walker teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that is in an area of Dim Light or Darkness.

range.special: unoccupied space that is in an area of Dim Light or Darkness

Belcorra Haruvex.name: Belcorra Haruvex
Belcorra Haruvex.description: If Belcorra is within the lowest chambers of Gauntlight (areas H37, I28, and J20), she can harness the ambient magic there to create the following effects. On Initiative count 20 (losing Initiative ties), Belcorra can create one effect or forego creating any effect that round. She can’t do so while she has the Incapacitated condition or is otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, she can’t create an effect until after her first turn in combat. When encountered within her lair, Belcorra’s Challenge Rating increases to 17 (XP 18,000).

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: [[lookup @name]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: Belcorra can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. She takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If Belcorra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. If she does, she can’t use Etherealness, and her Incorporeal Movement trait doesn’t function until the end of her next turn.

Site-Bound.name: Site-Bound
Site-Bound.description: Belcorra can’t leave the lowest three levels of the Abomination Vaults. When she is destroyed, she re-forms in [[/r 2d4]] days within area J20 (though she can reduce this time by using the Ebon Fulcrum Lens (page 218). Belcorra can be permanently destroyed only if she enacts her full revenge on Absalom or if Nhimbaloth devours her soul.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Belcorra makes two [[/item .GKKt2l4lE7kjVmGW]] attacks and uses [[/item .FV8izhYHFUzlk5Zr]].

Corrupting Gaze.name: Corrupting Gaze
Corrupting Gaze.description:
Belcorra glares at a creature she can see within 30 feet of her.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rKG9KJuKx6eNjZLe]].

Failure: 28 (8d6) Psychic damage.

Success: Half damage.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: Belcorra enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. She is visible on the Material Plane while on the Border Ethereal and vice versa, but she can’t affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

Gaze.name: Gaze
Gaze.description: Belcorra uses [[/item .FV8izhYHFUzlk5Zr]]. Belcorra can’t take this action again until the start of her next turn.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
Belcorra casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +10 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDancingLig], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireBolt00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMessage000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTrueStrike]

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplComprehend], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConfusion0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldMonste], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPhantasmal], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTeleportat]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFingerofDe], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WmQpxfjZwF3MGUby]

Cantrip.name: Cantrip
Cantrip.description: Belcorra uses [[/item .0iEWHQS22OJiiUfF]] to cast an at-will spell.

Ghostly Stride.name: Ghostly Stride
Ghostly Stride.description: Belcorra flies up to half her Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Finger of Death.name: 死亡一指
Finger of Death.description:
You unleash negative energy toward a creature you can see within range. The target makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 7d8 + 30 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

A Humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmZombie00000000]{Zombie} (see appendix B) that follows your verbal orders.

Globe of Invulnerability.name: 法术无效结界
Globe of Invulnerability.description:
一个固定的微光屏障在你周围 10 尺光环范围内出现并在法术持续时间内维持存在。

任何在屏障外施放的五环或更低环阶的法术无法影响其内的任何东西。此类法术能够以屏障内的生物或物件为目标，但无法对其生效。同样的，屏障内区域也将被排除在此类法术所创造的效应区域之外。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比六环高一环，屏障能阻挡的法术就高一环。

阻挡法术环阶：[[@item.level - 1]]环及以下。

Teleportation Circle.name: 传送法阵
Teleportation Circle.description:
施展该法术时，你在地上画出一个半径 5 尺的圆圈，并在其周围画出印记。这个圆形法阵将你所处的位置与一个你所选择的，与你处在同个位面上的永久传送法阵相连（你必须知道该法阵的印记序列）。圆圈中将打开一个发光的传送门，并持续开启到你的下一回合结束。任何进入传送门的生物将立即出现在目标法阵附近 5 尺内，如果该空间已被占据，则出现在最靠近目标法阵的未占据空间中。

许多大神殿、公会大厅和其他重要的场所都设有永久的传送法阵。这种法阵各有自己独一无二的印记序列，即按特定顺序排列的一串魔法符文。

你第一次获得施展该法术的能力时，你会习得物质位面上两个永久法阵的印记序列（由 DM 决定），随后你还可以在旅途中习得更多的印记序列。你只要花一分钟仔细研究一个新的印记序列就能够将其记录下来。

当你每日对同一地点连续施展该法术持续 365 天之后，将创造出一个永久的传送法阵。

materials.value: 价值 50+GP 的珍稀墨水，作为法术耗材

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

See Invisibility.name: 识破隐形
See Invisibility.description: 在法术持续时间内，你能看见任何 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 的生物和物件，如同其处于正常可见状态一样。你还能够看见以太位面，以太位面的生物和物件在你眼中会以幽灵般的半透明形状显现。

Phantasmal Killer.name: 魅影杀手
Phantasmal Killer.description:
你指定施法距离内一名你可见的生物，窥探其噩梦，依此创造一道只有目标能看见的幻象。目标生物进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标受到 4d10 点心灵伤害，且在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。豁免成功，则目标只受一半伤害，法术终止。

法术持续时间内，目标在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比四环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Fears Manifested.name: 陷入噩梦
Fears Manifested.description:
在法术持续时间内在属性检定和攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

法术持续时间内，你在其每回合结束时进行一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 豁免，豁免失败则再次受到心灵伤害。豁免成功则法术终止。

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
在施法距离内一处边长 30 尺的立方区域内创造出一个在空中舞动旋转的彩色图纹。图纹在出现片刻后消失，然后迫使区域内每个看到它的生物进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

如果受术生物受到任何伤害，或有其他生物用动作将其从恍惚中摇醒，则其身上的此效应将提前终止。

Hypnotized.name: 催眠
Hypnotized.description: 你在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

Hold Monster.name: 定身怪物
Hold Monster.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入麻痹状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Fireball.name: 火球术
Fireball.description:
A bright streak flashes from you to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into a fiery explosion. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried start burning.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.

materials.value: 一颗蝙蝠粪和硫磺搓成的小球

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Confusion.name: 困惑术
Confusion.description:
你选择施法距离内一点为中心，半径 10 尺球状区域内的所有生物必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则目标不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在其每个回合开始时掷 1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比四环高一环，此法术的球状区域半径就增加 5 尺。

Confused.name: 困惑
Confused.description:
你不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在你每个回合开始时掷1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

Comprehend Languages.name: 通晓语言
Comprehend Languages.description: 你在法术持续时间内知晓你所听到或看到手语的所有语言的字面意义。你也可以通过触碰书写的文字来读懂其字面意义。以这种方式阅读每页文字需要花费 1 分钟的时间。这个法术并不能解读符号和暗语。

True Strike.name: 克敌先击
True Strike.description:
你受到一瞬魔法洞见的指引，使用施展此法术时使用的那把武器发动一次攻击。此次攻击使用你的施法属性（而非力量属性或敏捷属性）进行攻击检定与伤害掷骰。此次攻击造成伤害时，你可以选择将其伤害类型改为光耀伤害，或是维持武器原本的伤害类型。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，无论你选择造成光耀伤害还是原本类型的伤害，本次攻击都会额外造成光耀伤害：5 级（1d6 点）、11 级（2d6 点）、17 级（3d6 点）。

materials.value: 一把价值 1+CP 的你熟练的武器

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Message.name: 传讯术
Message.description:
你用指向施法距离内的一个生物并低声说出一段信息。该目标（且只有该目标）会听到这段信息并可以用只有你能听见的低语回复你。

你可以隔着固态物件施展该法术，但你必须熟悉法术目标并知晓其就在屏障后方。魔法的沉默，1 尺厚的石头、金属或木料，一片薄铅都可以阻挡该法术。

Mending.name: 修复术
Mending.description:
该法术修复你所触碰一个物件上的一处破损或裂缝，例如修复一条断裂的链条、一把碎成两半的钥匙、一件撕裂的斗篷、一个漏了的酒袋等。只要破损或断裂处在任意方向上都不超过 1 尺，你就可以不留痕迹地修复它。

该法术可以物理性地修复一件魔法物品，但无法恢复其上的魔法。

Fire Bolt.name: 火焰箭
Fire Bolt.description:
你对施法距离内一名生物或物件掷出一把火焰，对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标将受到 [[/damage 1d10 type=fire]]伤害。未被着装或携带的可燃物件被该法术命中时将开始燃烧。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，此戏法的伤害将增加 1d10：5 级（2d10）、11 级（3d10）、17 级（4d10）。

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Gauntlight's Glare.name: Gauntlight's Glare
Gauntlight's Glare.description: Belcorra causes the ribbon of energy at the center of areas H37, I28, and J20 to flare, filling those areas with Bright Light until Initiative count 20 of the next round. If an area of Darkness created by a spell of level 7 or lower overlaps with these areas, that spell is dispelled. Belcorra can see along the ribbon’s length as if she were standing in all three areas simultaneously. In addition, she is aware of the presence of any magic within 30 feet of the ribbon and has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks she makes in those areas. Finally, an Undead creature (including Belcorra) that ends its turn in the intensified ribbon of energy regains 10 (3d6) Hit Points.

affects.special: The ribbon of energy at the center of areas H37, I28, and J20

Grasp of the Undying.name: Grasp of the Undying
Grasp of the Undying.description: Wispy hands emerge from the floor and ceiling until Initiative count 20 of the next round. The hands fill a 10-foot-square area Belcorra can see within 60 feet of her. While the hands last, the area is Difficult Terrain. When Belcorra uses her [[/item .GKKt2l4lE7kjVmGW]] attack, she can target any creature standing on the affected area.

Memento Mori.name: Memento Mori
Memento Mori.description: Grotesque faces resembling every creature Belcorra has ever killed (including those who were brought back from the dead) appear on every wall Belcorra can see within 60 feet of her. The faces last until Initiative count 20 of the next round. While the faces last, Belcorra can use [[/item .FV8izhYHFUzlk5Zr]] to target any creature within 30 feet of any haunted wall.

affects.special: Every wall that Belcorra can see

Drow Warden.name: Drow Warden
Drow Warden.description: Wardens watch over drow encampments and often work closely with one another in small groups.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The drow casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .o3AbszwKCj0KxwPr]]{Dancing Lights}

1/Day Each: [[/item .W2FBHDlRi1EfvJdE]]{Darkness} , [[/item .wm9NnuX3UTMKNmJB]]{Faerie Fire}

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Fey Ancestry.name: 精类血统
Fey Ancestry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put it to sleep.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) to enable in the Effects tab that applies disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Augrael has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Needle Spray.name: Needle Spray
Needle Spray.description:
The dreshkan fires a spray of electrified needles.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Awaiting Needle.name: Awaiting Needle
Awaiting Needle.description:
Trigger: A creature the dreshkan can see attacks the dreshkan and the attack roll misses by 5 or more.

Response: The dreshkan makes a melee or ranged [[/item Needle]] attack against that creature.

Alchemical Implants.name: Alchemical Implants
Alchemical Implants.description: The dreshkan has Advantage on saving throws against &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] and the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] and &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] conditions. Magic that restores a creature’s Hit Points restores only half as many Hit Points to the dreshkan.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the dreshkan has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Swarming Stance.name: Swarming Stance
Swarming Stance.description: The dreshkan can occupy the same space as another willing creature with this trait. While they share a creature’s space in this way, the dreshkan makes melee attack rolls with Advantage.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dreshkan makes two melee attacks.

Mitflit.name: Mitflit
Mitflit.description: Mitflits, also known as mites, are self-loathing and pitiful cowards with oversized heads, blue skin, and a penchant for befriending the ugliest of vermin. They tame insects, spiders, and other small creatures to serve as faithful allies. Mitflits have lost most of their ancestral magic, leaving them to feel incomplete and full of doubt and insecurity. Mitflits find companionship in the other base creatures of the world, and forge strong bonds of friendship with vermin, the only other beings that seem willing to accept them. A social structure, even one in which they are bullied, partially fills the hole within most mitflits’ personalities, and they rarely rebel or lash out unless their rage hits a breaking point.

Hatred.name: Hatred
Hatred.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against dwarves and gnomes.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Self-Loathing.name: Self-Loathing
Self-Loathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

Speak with Arthropods.name: Speak with Arthropods
Speak with Arthropods.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate simple concepts to arthropods when they speak in Undercommon.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .fCuWXUWpkEY5jBKy]]{Prestidigitation}

1/Day: [[/item .Ls3V1NCXaJuf2jHA]]{Bane}

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Bane.name: 灾祸
Bane.description:
你选择施法距离内至多三个你可见的生物，迫使其分别进行一次魅力豁免。在法术终止前，豁免失败于此次魅力豁免的目标进行的每次攻击检定与豁免检定都必须承受 1d4 的减值。

升环施法：你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多选择一个生物作为目标。

Bane.name: 灾祸
Bane.description: 在法术结束前，该目标进行的攻击检定或豁免检定都必须从检定结果中减去 1d4。

Vengeful.name: 睚眦必报
Vengeful.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits them with an attack.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a [[/item Dagger]] or [[/item Dart]] attack against the creature.

utility.condition: A creature the mitflit can see hits them with an attack.

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶钉皮甲
Studded Leather Armor.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of his allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Onl.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Onl.description: In humanoid form, Jaul makes three [[/item Dagger]] attacks. In hybrid form, he can attack like a humanoid or make one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Claw]] attack.

Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only).name: 啃咬（仅狼与混合形态）
Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only).description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a humanoid, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11.

Failure: The target is cursed. If the cursed target drops to 0 Hit Points, it instead becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmWerewolf000000]{Werewolf} under the GM’s control and has 10 Hit Points.

Success: The target is immune to Jaul’s curse for 24 hours.

Spellcasting (Humanoid Form Only).name: Spellcasting (Humanoid Form Only)
Spellcasting (Humanoid Form Only).description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no {type} components and using {ability} as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPoisonSpra]{Poison Spray} (2d12 Poison damage), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplProduceFla]{Produce Flame} (2d8 Fire damage)

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{Entangle}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFlamingSph]{Flaming Sphere}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpikeGrowt]{Spike Growth}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplConjureAni]{Conjure Animals}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRevivify00]{Revivify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleetStorm]{Sleet Storm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWaterBreat]{Water Breathing}

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name]] shape-shifts into a Large wolf-humanoid hybrid or a Medium wolf, or he returns to his true humanoid form. His game statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Keen Hearing and Smell.name: 敏锐嗅听觉
Keen Hearing and Smell.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Poison Spray.name: 毒气喷溅
Poison Spray.description:
你向施法距离内一个你可见的生物喷出一股毒气。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标将受 [[/damage 1d12 type=poison]]伤害。

戏法强化： 到达特定等级后，此戏法的伤害将增加 1d12：5 级（2d12）、11 级（3d12）、17 级（4d12）。

Produce Flame.name: 燃火术
Produce Flame.description:
一朵摇曳的火焰出现在你手中并火焰在法术持续时间存在。火焰在你手中期间，不会散发任何热量也不会点燃任何东西，发出半径 20 尺明亮光照，以及额外 20 尺微光光照。你再次施展该法术时，法术终止。

直到法术结束为止，你可以用一个魔法动作向距你 60 尺内的一名生物或一个物件丢出火焰。进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到 1d8 点火焰伤害。

戏法强化： 你到达特定等级时，其伤害增加 1d8（5 级 2d8、11 级 3d8、17 级 4d8）。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
缠绕的植物在施法距离内从 20 尺方状区域地面中破土而出。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。法术结束时，这些植物会消失。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物（除你之外）必须成功于一次力量豁免，否则陷入&Reference[restrained]{束缚}状态，直到法术终止。一名因此被束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次[[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定对抗该法术的豁免 DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Flaming Sphere.name: 炽焰法球
Flaming Sphere.description:
一颗直径 5 尺的火焰球显现在施法距离内地面上的一处未被占据的空间，并在法术持续时间内持续存在。任何生物在火球周围 5 尺内结束其回合时必须进行一次 [[/save ability=dex dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] 豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d6 点火焰伤敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d6 点火焰伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

你可以用一个附赠动作将火球沿着地面移动 30 尺。如果你将火球移入某名生物所占据的空间，则该生物必须进行对抗火球伤害的豁免，而火球在该回合内停止移动。

移动火球时，你可以指引它越过不高于 5 尺的障碍，或者越过不宽过 10 尺的陷坑。被火球触碰的任何未被着装或携带的可燃物件都会开始燃烧。火球向其周围散发出半径 20 尺的明亮光照，以及额外 20 尺的微光光照。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比二环高一环，其伤害就增加 1d6。

Spike Growth.name: 荆棘丛生
Spike Growth.description:
以施法距离内一点为中心周围 20 尺半径的球状区域扭曲变形，大片坚硬的棘刺破土而出。该区域在法术持续时间内视为困难地形。而生物进入该区域或在其中移动时，其每移动 5 尺就要受到 [[/damage 2d4 type=piercing]] 伤害。

法术导致的地面变形经过伪装，使其看起来并无异样。如果生物在你施展该法术时不能看见该区域，则它必须进行一次 [[/check ability=wis skill=prc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 或 [[/check ability=wis skill=sur dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，检定成功则能在进入之前发现该区域隐藏的危险

Conjure Animals.name: 咒唤兽群
Conjure Animals.description:
你将显现为幽灵般虚幻的大型兽群的自然精魂咒唤在施法距离内一处你可见的未占据空间中。兽群在持续时间内一直存在，并且你可以选择动物精魂的形态——例如狼群、蛇群或是鸟群。

在你位于兽群 5 尺内期间，你的力量豁免检定具有优势。当你在你的回合移动时，你可以令兽群也移动至多 30 尺到一处你可见的未被占据的空间中。

每当兽群在移动中进入了一名你可见的生物 10 尺内时、一名你可见的生物进入位于兽群 10 尺内的空间或是在该空间结束其回合时，你都可以迫使该生物进行一次敏捷豁免检定。失败则该生物受到 3d10 挥砍伤害。一名生物一回合只需要进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d10。

Revivify.name: 回生术
Revivify.description: 你接触在前一分钟内刚刚死亡的一名生物。该生物以 1 点生命值回生。该法术不能复活老死的生物，也不能恢复失去的身体部位。

materials.value: 一颗价值 300+GP 的钻石，作为法术耗材

Sleet Storm.name: 雪雨暴
Sleet Storm.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并使以该点为中心，高 40 尺、半径 20 尺的柱状区域内降下冷冻刺骨的冻雨和冰雹直至法术终止。该区域将造成&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}，且该区域内的一切外露的暴露在外的明火都将被浇熄。

该区域的地面变成&Reference[difficultterrain]{困难地形}。生物在一个回合内首次进入该区域或在区域内开始其回合时，它必须成功通过一次敏捷豁免，否则将陷&Reference[prone]{倒地}状态并失去 &Reference[concentration]{专注}。

Water Breathing.name: 水下呼吸
Water Breathing.description: 在法术终止前，该法术让施法距离内你所选择的至多十个自愿生物获得在水下呼吸的能力。此外，受术者依然保有正常的呼吸能力。

Bejeweled Necklace.name: Bejeweled Necklace
Bejeweled Necklace.description: A bejeweled necklace featuring a porpoise and an engraving which reads "Ayla, My Beloved".

Cauthooj.name: Cauthooj
Cauthooj.description: A lone cauthooj can be encountered in area I41.

Thoughtsense.name: Thoughtsense
Thoughtsense.description: The cauthooj can pinpoint the location of creatures with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher within 60 feet of them.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .qLiOxBPkgnCEsLHh]] and makes two [[/item .KitgUNuKde8gJxxQ]] attacks.

Warbling Song.name: Warbling Song
Warbling Song.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gives a strange, ululating cry that causes nearby creatures to lash out violently and without control.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Creatures immune to the Charmed condition automatically succeed on the save.

Failure: The target can’t take Reactions until the end of its next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Success: The target is immune to Warbling Song for 1 minute.

Warbling Song.name: Warbling Song
Warbling Song.description:
The target can’t take Reactions until the end of its next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The target makes a melee attack against a random creature within its reach or does nothing if it can’t make such an attack.

Staccato Strike.name: Staccato Strike
Staccato Strike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses subtle alterations in the pitch and tone of its song to direct one creature affected by its [[/item .qLiOxBPkgnCEsLHh]]. If that creature can hear the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it makes a melee attack against a creature within its reach chosen by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Hop-Dodge.name: Hop-Dodge
Hop-Dodge.description:
Trigger: A creature the cauthooj can see targets it with a melee attack.

Response: The cauthooj chooses another creature within 5 feet of them. That creature becomes the target of the triggering attack, and the cauthooj moves up to half their Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

Urdefhan Cult Fanatic.name: Urdefhan Cult Fanatic
Urdefhan Cult Fanatic.description: Urdefhan cult fanatics serve more powerful figures in a cult, such as blood mages. They consider battle a sacred endeavor and usually fight to the death.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The urdefhan casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal] (self only), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLight00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplResistance], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCommand000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInflictWou], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShieldofFa]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The urdefhan makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Dagger]] attack.

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Daemonic Devotion.name: Daemonic Devotion
Daemonic Devotion.description: The urdefhan has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition.

Feather Fall.name: 羽落术
Feather Fall.description: 指定施法距离内至多五个正坠落的生物。受术生物的坠落速度在法术持续时间内降低至每回合 60 尺。如果该生物在法术终止前落地，则其不会受到任何坠落伤害，且着地后法术对该生物的效应随即终止。

activation.condition: 你或距你 60 尺内的可见生物坠落时可用

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Resistance.name: 抗性
Resistance.description: 你触碰一名自愿生物并选择一种伤害类型：强酸、钝击、寒冷、火焰、闪电、暗蚀、穿刺、毒素、光耀、挥砍、雷鸣。在此法术结束之前，每当该生物受到所选类型伤害时，那名生物所受的总伤害减少 1d4。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Acid Protection.name: 防护强酸
Acid Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Bludgeoning Protection.name: 抵抗钝击
Bludgeoning Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Cold Protection.name: 防护寒冷
Cold Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Fire Protection.name: 防护火焰
Fire Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Lightning Protection.name: 防护闪电
Lightning Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Necrotic Protection.name: 抵抗暗蚀
Necrotic Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Piercing Protection.name: 抵抗穿刺
Piercing Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Poison Protection.name: 抵抗毒素
Poison Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Radiant Protection.name: 抵抗光耀
Radiant Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Slashing Protection.name: 抵抗挥砍
Slashing Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Thunder Protection.name: 防护雷鸣
Thunder Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Inflict Wounds.name: 致伤术
Inflict Wounds.description:
你迫使触碰的一名生物进行体质豁免检定，豁免失败将受到 [[/damage 2d10 type=necrotic]]伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法：你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，暗蚀伤害就增加 1d10。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: 一片闪着微光的魔法力场围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物，使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Shimmering Field.name: 微光力场
Shimmering Field.description: 你在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: 衰弱射线
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
你向施法距离内的一名生物射出一道让人衰弱的能量射线。目标必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免成功，则目标直到你的下个回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有&Reference[disadvantage]{劣势}。

豁免失败，目标在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复豁免，豁免成功则法术终止。

Brief Enfeeblement.name: 短暂衰弱
Brief Enfeeblement.description: 你直至你的下一回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

Enervated.name: 无力
