Slashing Protection.name: 抵抗挥砍
Slashing Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Thunder Protection.name: 防护雷鸣
Thunder Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Spare the Dying.name: 维生术
Spare the Dying.description:
选择一个生命值为 0 但还未死亡的生物，使该生物变为伤势稳定。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，此法术的施法距离将翻倍：5 级（30 尺），11 级（60 尺），17 级（120 尺）。

affects.special: 生命值为 0 但还未死亡

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Booming Voice.name: 扩音
Booming Voice.description: 你的语音音量变为通常情况下的三倍大，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在[[/check ability=cha skill=itm]]检定上具有优势 。

Aid.name: 援助术
Aid.description:
Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

Level 2: +5 Max HP.name: 2 环：生命值上限 +5
Level 2: +5 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 3: +10 Max HP.name: 3 环：生命值上限 +10
Level 3: +10 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 4: +15 Max HP.name: 4 环：生命值上限 +15
Level 4: +15 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 5: +20 Max HP.name: 5 环：生命值上限 +20
Level 5: +20 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 6: +25 Max HP.name: 6 环：生命值上限 +25
Level 6: +25 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 7: +30 Max HP.name: 7 环：生命值上限 +30
Level 7: +30 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 8: +35 Max HP.name: 8 环：生命值上限 +35
Level 8: +35 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 9: +40 Max HP.name: 9 环：生命值上限 +40
Level 9: +40 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Augury.name: 卜筮术
Augury.description:
You receive an omen from an otherworldly entity about the results of a course of action that you plan to take within the next 30 minutes. The DM chooses the omen from the Omens table.

OmenFor Results That Will Be …
WealGood
WoeBad
Weal and woeGood and bad
IndifferenceNeither good nor bad

The spell doesn't account for circumstances, such as other spells, that might change the results.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

materials.value: 绘有标记的短棒、骨头、卡片、或类似的预言道具，价值 25+GP

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Divination.name: 预言术
Divination.description:
此法术让你得以与一名神祇或其仆人取得联络。你可以就某个未来 7 日内将要发生的特定目标、事件或活动提出一个问题。DM 将给予你真实的答复，这个答复可能是一段短语或一节神秘的短诗。此法术的回答并不会顾及所有可能影响结果的情况。例如其他法术的影响。

若你在完成一次长休前施展多于一次该法术，则法术有概率不给出任何结果。此概率从第二次施展起每次累计 25％。

materials.value: 价值 25+GP 的熏香，作为法术耗材

Guardian of Faith.name: Guardian of Faith
Guardian of Faith.description:
一名大型@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.actors.Actor.phbsplGuardianof]{灵体守护者}出现在施法距离内一处由你指定的，你可见且未被占据的空间，并在法术持续时间内在该处悬浮。占据该空间的守护者是无敌的，并且会以适合你神祇或神系的形态出现。

任何敌人在一回合内首次进入距守护者 10 尺内或于其 10 尺内开始其回合时，必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败受到 20 点光耀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。守护者在造成总计 60 点伤害后随即消失。

Locate Object.name: 物件定位术
Locate Object.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location if that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you if you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead blocks a direct path between you and the object.

Spirit Guardians.name: 灵体卫士
Spirit Guardians.description:
Protective spirits flit around you in a 15-foot Emanation for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate creatures to be unaffected by it. Any other creature's Speed is halved in the Emanation, and whenever the Emanation enters a creature's space and whenever a creature enters the Emanation or ends its turn there, the creature must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 Radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 Necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 3.

Half Speed.name: Half Speed
Half Speed.description: 在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。

Stone Shape.name: 塑石术
Stone Shape.description: 你触碰一个体积为中型或更小的石质物件或某块岩石在任何方向都不超过 5 尺的一部分，并将其塑造成你想要的任意形状。例如你可以将一块大石头塑造成一件武器、一尊塑像、或一个保险箱，也可以在石墙上开出一条小通道，前提是墙的厚度不能超过 5 尺。你也可以使一扇石门或石质门框变形来将门封死。你创造的物件最多可以有两条铰链和一道闩，除此之外不能以该法术塑造出更复杂的机械结构。

Commune.name: 通神术
Commune.description:
你与一名神明或一名神明的代理人进行联系，并询问至多三个能以“是”或“否”回答的问题。你必须在法术结束前完成提问。你会收到每个问题的正确答案。

这些神能存在也并非全知全能，因此当问题涉及的信息超过神的认知范围时，你可能会得到一句“不确定”作为回答。另外当一个单词的回答可能引致误导或者与神的兴致相违背时，DM 可能会提供一句短语作为答案。

若你在完成一次长休前施展两次或更多次的该法术，则法术有一定的几率不给任何答复。此概率从第二次施展起每次累计 25％。

Contagion.name: 疫病术
Contagion.description:
你的触碰会传染一道魔法疫病。目标必须成功通过一次体质豁免，否则受到 11d8 暗蚀伤害并陷入&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]{中毒}状态。此外，当你施展法术时选择一项属性，目标在中毒期间进行所选属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

目标在其每回合结束时必须重新豁免，直至其累计三次成功或失败。若目标累计三次成功，则结束其身上该法术的效应。若目标累计三次失败，其身上该法术的效应持续 7 日。

每当中毒目标受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，目标必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]]{体质}豁免，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Strength).name: 感染（力量）
Infected (Strength).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Dexterity).name: 感染（敏捷）
Infected (Dexterity).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Constitution).name: 感染（体质）
Infected (Constitution).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Intelligence).name: 感染（智力）
Infected (Intelligence).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Wisdom).name: 感染（感知）
Infected (Wisdom).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Charisma).name: 感染（魅力）
Infected (Charisma).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Legend Lore.name: 通晓传奇
Legend Lore.description:
点名或描述一个著名的人物，地点，或物件。该法术在你脑海中形成一段由 DM 描述的关于该事物重要传闻的简单概述。

这些传闻可能包括了重要的细节，有趣的揭秘，也可能是不曾被广泛知晓的秘闻。你掌握目标越多的信息，所得到的信息就越精确细致。你由此得到的信息必定是准确的，但仍可能会以比喻或诗歌来表达，具体将由 DM 决定。

如果你选的事物其实并不著名，你会听到仿佛由长号演奏而出的悲伤的音符，随后法术失败。

materials.value: 价值 250+GP 的熏香，作为法术耗材。以及每块价值 50+GP 的四块象牙板

Mass Cure Wounds.name: Mass Cure Wounds
Mass Cure Wounds.description:
一道治愈能量从施法距离内你指定的一点涤荡而出。你在该点周边 30 尺半径的球状区域内指定至多六个生物，并使每个目标生物恢复 5d8+你的施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比五环高一环，法术的治疗量就增加 1d8。

Curtain of Stone.name: Curtain of Stone
Curtain of Stone.description:
Trigger: The drow is hit by an attack roll while touching a stone surface.

Response: The drow adds 5 to their AC against the triggering attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Caligni Custodian.name: Caligni Custodian
Caligni Custodian.description: Custodians are caligni high priests or prophets who lead other calignis in worship, usually to their mysterious and sinister demigods known as the Forsaken. The Forsaken warped the calignis into tough survivors, but at a price: every caligni that dies transforms into energy as a scrap of their soul feeds the Forsaken.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The caligni casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .dTvXFAKX1BfO9hdc]]{Darkness}, [[/item .w5Go6BB4PiTAv50L]]{Detect Magic}, [[/item .dNIz0Lu6B7qx5DTh]]{Fog Cloud}, [[/item .Um5s9fTFtW1YvUyz]]{Ray of Frost}

2/Day Each: [[/item .t177HnsNWFtkFy2K]]{Shield}

1/Day Each: [[/item .kNtS8U1C8ySPqkf3]]{Blindness/Deafness} (level 3 version), [[/item .1LAEDPZNX1j0Fjld]]{Divination} , [[/item .dploOGIRxARBg1eH]]{Haste}, [[/item .kC81aCzvmJ0BFkUr]]{Hold Person}, [[/item .Wm4ux4T4zmi5WyW7]]{Invisibility}, [[/item .my3GGg0L7qnNwOJJ]]{Suggestion}, [[/item .RMWvRZgg2aRsIVx1]]{Vampiric Touch} (level 3 version)

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The caligni makes two [[/item War Flail]] attacks. It can replace one attack to use [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item Ray of Frost]].

Opportune Step.name: Opportune Step
Opportune Step.description:
Trigger: A creature the caligni can see moves into a space within 5 feet of them.

Response: The caligni moves up to half their Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

utility.condition: A creature the caligni can see moves into a space within 5 feet of them.

War Flail.name: War Flail
War Flail.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must make a successful [[/save format=long]] or it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Death Flare.name: Death Flare
Death Flare.description:
The caligni explodes in a burst of chilling shadow when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yekDKOgvxkYJYpGu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=yekDKOgvxkYJYpGu]]-foot Emanation originating from the caligni.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Anything the caligni is wearing or carrying falls to the ground unharmed.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the caligni has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。球状区域被&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被强风（比如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}创造的风）吹散。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Ray of Frost.name: 冷冻射线
Ray of Frost.description:
一道冰冷的蓝白色光线朝施法距离内的一个生物射去。你对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 点寒冷伤害，并且在你的下一回合开始前速度减少 10 尺。

你到达 5 级时，该法术的伤害增加 1d8（变为 2d8）。11 级时再加 1d8（变为 3d8），17 级时再加 1d8（变为 4d8）。

Reduced Movement.name: 降低速度
Reduced Movement.description: 直至施法者的下一回合开始，你的速度减少 10 尺。

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Blindness/Deafness.name: 目盲术/耳聋术
Blindness/Deafness.description:
处于你施法范围内的一个你可见的生物必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败者在法术持续期间陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 或 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态（由你选择）。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复此豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blindness.name: 目盲
Blindness.description: 目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

Deafness.name: 耳聋
Deafness.description: 目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

Divination.name: 预言术
Divination.description:
此法术让你得以与一名神祇或其仆人取得联络。你可以就某个未来 7 日内将要发生的特定目标、事件或活动提出一个问题。DM 将给予你真实的答复，这个答复可能是一段短语或一节神秘的短诗。此法术的回答并不会顾及所有可能影响结果的情况。例如其他法术的影响。

若你在完成一次长休前施展多于一次该法术，则法术有概率不给出任何结果。此概率从第二次施展起每次累计 25％。

materials.value: 价值 25+GP 的熏香，作为法术耗材

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description:
Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target's Speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to Armor Class, it has Advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used to take only the Attack (one attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Utilize action.

When the spell ends, the target is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and has a Speed of 0 until the end of its next turn, as a wave of lethargy washes over it.

Hasted.name: 加速
Hasted.description:
Until the spell ends, the target’s Speed is doubled, it gains a +2 bonus to Armor Class, it has Advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used to take only the Attack (one attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Utilize action.

When the spell ends, the target is Incapacitated and has a Speed of 0 until the end of its next turn, as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHaste00000.ActiveEffect.S5XcFawnnNHO8bUr]{wave of lethargy} washes over it.

Lethargy.name: 嗜睡
Lethargy.description: 法术终止时，你将泛起一阵倦意使自己&Reference[Incapacitated]{失能}并且速度为 0，并持续至你的下一回合结束。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。

Vampiric Touch.name: 吸血鬼之触
Vampiric Touch.description:
你的阴影环绕着的手可以吸取他人的生命力来为自己疗伤。对你触及范围内的一名生物进行一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到[[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic]]伤害，而你则恢复数值等同于所造成暗蚀伤害一半的生命值。

该法术终止前，你可以在你的每个回合内用&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作对相同或不同的生物进行一次这样的攻击。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比三环高一环，此法术的伤害就提高 1d6。

Potion of Greater Healing.name: Potion of Greater Healing
Potion of Greater Healing.description:
药水的红色液体在摇晃时会闪闪发光。

当你喝下这瓶药水时，你会恢复 4d4 + 4 点生命值。

Potion of Heroism.name: 英勇药水
Potion of Heroism.description:
This blue potion bubbles and steams as if boiling.

For 1 hour after drinking it, you gain 10 temporary hit points that last for 1 hour. For the same duration, you are under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr]{Bless} spell (no concentration required)

Foundry Note

The Other Formula button can be used to roll the bonus 1d4 received from Bless.

Witchfire.name: Witchfire
Witchfire.description:
Manifesting as a sinuous form wreathed in sickly green flames, this incorporeal undead forms when a powerful hag or witch dies in agony or rage. The body at the center of the flames usually resembles the witch’s idealized self-image, regardless of their age and appearance at the time of their death.

A witchfire often resides in a bog or swamp, which slowly blackens and decays around them. These regions are often plagued by will-o’-wisps, which seem to have an uncanny relationship with the resident witchfire. A witchfire might visit villages on the edge of their home terrain to lure away villagers, but always attack victims within earshot to make sure that other villagers hear the screams. A witchfire might also ally with other hags or witches and may even join their covens.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The witchfire can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. They take [[/damage average]] damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Witchflame Curse.name: Witchflame Curse
Witchflame Curse.description: A creature subjected to a Witchflame Curse emits ghostly flames, shedding Dim Light in a 10-foot radius. While cursed with witchflame, the creature can’t benefit from the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition.

affects.special: A creature subjected to a Witchflame Curse

Witchflame Curse.name: Witchflame Curse
Witchflame Curse.description:
When affected by the Witchflame Curse, you shed Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

While cursed with witchflame, you can’t benefit from the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The witchfire makes two attacks.

Witchflame Caress.name: Witchflame Caress
Witchflame Caress.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6gsDduF7nT8bRi7K]].

Failure: The target is subjected to a [[/item Witchflame Curse]].

Witchflame Bolt.name: Witchflame Bolt
Witchflame Bolt.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RdDNIm4fUVWEQqYy]].

Failure: The target is subjected to a [[/item Witchflame Curse]].

Witchflame Kindling.name: Witchflame Kindling
Witchflame Kindling.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9syRr7wLNP1oyU7l]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=9syRr7wLNP1oyU7l]] feet that is subjected to a [[/item Witchflame Curse]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The witchfire casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .KS1zQTPL9pAvs6br]]{Dancing Lights}, [[/item .8kOXdtWI6hsu1eeH]]{Mage Hand}, [[/item .a3YcpSmVuuj4GFVV]]{Minor Illusion}

1/Day: [[/item .0zzhihWOkzu0rgSW]]{Eyebite}

Minor Illusion.name: 次级幻象
Minor Illusion.description:
你在施法距离内创造一段声响或一个物件的影像，并使之维持至法术持续时间结束，详见以下对应效应的描述。你可以再次施展该法术来终止幻象。

生物用研究动作调查该声响或影像时，其必须进行一次对抗该法术豁免 DC 的[[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spelldc]]检定，检定成功则判断出是幻象。对于识破幻象的生物而言，幻象会变得模糊不清。

声响。 如果你创造一段声响，其音量可以是低声耳语也可以是高声尖叫。它可以是你或其他任何人的嗓音，或者是一头狮子的咆哮、一段鼓声以及任何你指定的其他声响。声响在持续时间内不会减弱，或者你也可以于法术终止前在不同的时间段创造几段分散的声响。

影像。 如果你创造一个物件的影像，比如一把椅子、泥泞的脚印、一个小箱子等，则该物件各方向上大小不得大于 5 尺立方区域。该影像不具有声音、光亮、味道或任何其他的感官效应。由于影像可以被任何物体穿透，因此与之进行物理互动时都会揭露其幻象的本质。

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Eyebite.name: 摄心目光
Eyebite.description:
For the duration, your eyes become an inky void. One creature of your choice within 60 feet of you that you can see must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects of your choice for the duration.

On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take a Magic action to target another creature but can't target a creature again if it has succeeded on a save against this casting of the spell.

Asleep. The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition. It wakes up if it takes any damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Panicked. The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. On each of its turns, the Frightened target must take the &Reference[Dash] action and move away from you by the safest and shortest route available. If the target moves to a space at least 60 feet away from you where it can't see you, this effect ends.

Sickened. The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

affects.special: 不能指定那些已经通过本次施展的该法术豁免的生物

Asleep.name: 沉睡
Asleep.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] 状态。你在受到任何伤害，或另一个生物使用一个动作摇晃你时，即可再次醒来。

Panicked.name: 惊慌
Panicked.description: 你陷入&Reference[Frightened apply=false]{恐慌}状态，你必须在每个自己回合里执行 &Reference[Dash]{疾走}动作并移动，且以最短、最安全的路径尽可能的逃离施法者，直至你无路可逃为止。如果你移至一处距施法者至少 60 尺远且看不见施法者的空间，则此效应终止。

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
Salaisa casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDancingLig]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDarkness00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Salaisa makes three melee attacks. She can use [[/item Order Attack]] in place of one attack.

Order Attack.name: Order Attack
Order Attack.description: Salaisa shouts or signs an order. One drow ally within 30 feet of Salaisa that can see or hear her can use a Reaction to make an attack.

Parry And Riposte.name: Parry And Riposte
Parry And Riposte.description:
Trigger: Salaisa is hit by an attack while she is holding a melee weapon.

Response: Salaisa adds 3 to her AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. If the attack misses, Salaisa can make a melee attack against the attacker.

Hand Crossbow.name: 手弩
Hand Crossbow.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 minute. While poisoned this way, attacks against the creature have Advantage. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also has the Unconscious condition while Poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Mithral Half Plate Armor.name: 秘银半身板甲
Mithral Half Plate Armor.description: Mithral is a light, flexible metal. A mithral chain shirt or breastplate can be worn under normal clothes. If the armor normally imposes disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks or has a Strength requirement, the mithral version of the armor doesn't.

Fey Ancestry.name: 精类血统
Fey Ancestry.description: Salaisa has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition. Magic can’t put her to sleep.

Indomitable.name: Indomitable
Indomitable.description: If Salaisa fails a saving throw, she can reroll it with a +9 bonus.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Salaisa has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: The voidglutton’s eyes and the tips of their fingers glow with colored light, casting Bright Light in a 30-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The voidglutton can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. The voidglutton takes [[/damage 1d10 force average]] damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The voidglutton has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The voidglutton makes two [[/item Ectoplasmic Claw]] attacks. In place of one attack, it can use [[/item Ectoplasmic Web]].

Ectoplasmic Claw.name: Ectoplasmic Claw
Ectoplasmic Claw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the voidglutton scores a Critical Hit, the target has the &Reference[Frightened] condition until the end of the voidglutton’s next turn.

Ectoplasmic Web.name: Ectoplasmic Web
Ectoplasmic Web.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the voidglutton can see within 60 feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, even if it has the Incorporeal Movement trait, until the web is destroyed (AC 15; HP 15; Resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

Feed on Light.name: Feed on Light
Feed on Light.description: The voidglutton casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, requiring no components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15). While the voidglutton is in the area, their Illumination trait is suppressed and they have the &Reference[Blinded] condition, except that they can see creatures that are dying and those with the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition in the area. The darkness lasts until the voidglutton’s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect. The voidglutton’s Concentration ends early immediately after the voidglutton makes an attack roll, uses [[/item Feed on Fear,]] or uses Feed on Light again.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并在法术持续时间内使魔法性 &Reference[darkness] 斥以该点为中心半径 15 尺的球状区域。黑暗视觉也无法看穿这这种黑暗，非魔法的光照也无法将其照亮。

或者，你可以将此法术施展于一个未被着装或携带的物件上，使黑暗充斥以该物件为中心的 15 尺光环区域。将该物件用不透明的东西遮掩（比如用碗或头盔盖住）时，会将黑暗隔绝。

如果法术区域与任何二环或更低环阶法术创造的明亮光照或微光光照区域重叠，则这些造光的法术将被解除。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: The voidglutton makes an [[/item Ectoplasmic Claw]] attack.

Feed on Fear.name: Feed on Fear
Feed on Fear.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature that is dying or has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition that the voidglutton can see within 30 feet of them.

Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

Success: Half damage.

Success or Failure: The voidglutton regains Hit Points equal to the Psychic damage dealt.

affects.special: creature that is dying or has the Frightened condition

Lair Actions.name: Lair Actions
Lair Actions.description:
On Initiative count 20 (losing all Initiative ties), the voidglutton can harness the ambient magic in area D12, D13, D19, or D20 to cause one of the following effects. It can’t do so while it has the Incapacitated condition or if it is otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can’t create any effect until after its first turn in combat. It can’t create the same effect two rounds in a row.

An illusory memory of Belcorra’s victory over adventurers in the past plays out in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the voidglutton can see within 60 feet of it. A creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until it leaves the area. The illusion is short, but it repeats over and over. The illusion vanishes if the voidglutton dies or if it creates a different effect.

Ectoplasmic webbing fills a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the voidglutton can see within 60 feet of it. The webs are &Reference[Difficult Terrain] and make the area &Reference[Lightly Obscured]. The webs disappear if the voidglutton dies or if it creates a different effect.

Reaper Skull Puffball.name: Reaper Skull Puffball
Reaper Skull Puffball.description: When this fungus detects prey, its tendrils writhe and exude a paralytic toxin.

Tendril.name: 卷须
Tendril.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9cBhvoZ8atrSKoR5]].

Success: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned in this way, the creature also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Poisoned & Paralyzed.name: 中毒并麻痹
Poisoned & Paralyzed.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned in this way, the creature also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Spore Cloud.name: Spore Cloud
Spore Cloud.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=f9oPb4QQOCv3Wkp2]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=f9oPb4QQOCv3Wkp2]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=f9oPb4QQOCv3Wkp2]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is subjected to [[/item Skull Rot]] poison.

Success: Half damage only.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The puffball makes two [[/item Tendril]] attacks.

Skull Rot Poison.name: Skull Rot Poison
Skull Rot Poison.description:
A creature subjected to Skull Rot poison makes a [[/save format=long]] at the end of each of its turns.

On a failed save, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage, and its Hit Point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken.

On a success, the effect ends.

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes in a burst of poisonous spores when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=drRnMRHgrgXDkzxL]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=drRnMRHgrgXDkzxL]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature is subjected to [[/item Skull Rot Poison]].

Success: Half damage only.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The urdefhan casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFeatherFal] (self only)

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature that isn’t an Undead or Construct, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11.

Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum is reduced by 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) Hit Points, and the urdefhan regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶钉皮甲
Studded Leather Armor.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

Feather Fall.name: 羽落术
Feather Fall.description: 指定施法距离内至多五个正坠落的生物。受术生物的坠落速度在法术持续时间内降低至每回合 60 尺。如果该生物在法术终止前落地，则其不会受到任何坠落伤害，且着地后法术对该生物的效应随即终止。

activation.condition: 你或距你 60 尺内的可见生物坠落时可用

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: 衰弱射线
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
你向施法距离内的一名生物射出一道让人衰弱的能量射线。目标必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免成功，则目标直到你的下个回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有&Reference[disadvantage]{劣势}。

豁免失败，目标在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复豁免，豁免成功则法术终止。

Brief Enfeeblement.name: 短暂衰弱
Brief Enfeeblement.description: 你直至你的下一回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

Enervated.name: 无力
Enervated.description: 你在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复[[/save ability=con]]{豁免}，豁免成功则法术终止。

Necrotic Decay.name: Necrotic Decay
Necrotic Decay.description:
When the urdefhan dies, their flesh sublimates into noxious gas.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the urdefhan.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Graveknight.name: Graveknight
Graveknight.description:
TRAITS

Graveknight’s Curse. A creature that isn’t a Construct
or Undead that dons the graveknight’s armor is
subjected to the following effect. Charisma Saving
Throw: DC 17. Failure: The creature is afflicted with the
graveknight’s curse. The cursed creature can’t remove
the graveknight’s armor and must repeat the saving
throw whenever it finishes a Long Rest. First Failure:
The creature has Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws.
Second Failure: The creature’s Speed is halved. Third
Failure: The creature dies and rises immediately as the
armor’s graveknight. Success: The curse ends, and the
creature is immune to this Graveknight’s Curse until it
removes the armor and dons it again.
Rejuvenation. If the graveknight is destroyed, their armor
regrows their body in 1d10 days. The graveknight
regains all their Hit Points and becomes active again.
If a creature is wearing the graveknight’s armor when
the graveknight rejuvenates, that creature dies and their
body merges with the graveknight. The graveknight can
be permanently destroyed only by obliterating their
armor with a Disintegrate spell, transporting the armor
to the Positive Energy Plane, or by throwing the armor
into the heart of a volcano.
Ruinous Energy. The graveknight presented here is infused
with Cold, but others are infused with Acid, Electricity,
or Fire. The graveknight is immune to the damage type
of its Ruinous Energy, and its attacks and Devastating
Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.
Sacrilegious Aura. A creature that casts a spell that
restores Hit Points or uses an ability that magically
restores Hit Points in a 30-foot Emanation originating
from the graveknight is subjected to the following effect.
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17. Failure: The creature’s
spell or ability fails with no effect.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The graveknight makes two [[/item Greatsword]] attacks.

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Longbow.name: 长弓
Longbow.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 30/60 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Devastating Blast.name: Devastating Blast
Devastating Blast.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage plus [[/damage 3d8 average type=cold]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: Trigger: The graveknight is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The graveknight adds 4 to their AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Plate Armor.name: 板甲
Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Graveknight's Curse.name: Graveknight's Curse
Graveknight's Curse.description:
A creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead that dons the graveknight’s armor is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17.

Failure: The creature is afflicted with the graveknight’s curse. The cursed creature can’t remove the graveknight’s armor and must repeat the saving throw whenever it finishes a Long Rest.

First Failure: The creature has Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws.

Second Failure: The creature’s Speed is halved.

Third Failure: The creature dies and rises immediately as the armor’s graveknight.

Success: The curse ends, and the creature is immune to this Graveknight’s Curse until it removes the armor and dons it again.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If the graveknight is destroyed, their armor regrows their body in [[/r 1d10]] days. The graveknight regains all their Hit Points and becomes active again. If a creature is wearing the graveknight’s armor when the graveknight rejuvenates, that creature dies and their body merges with the graveknight. The graveknight can be permanently destroyed only by obliterating their armor with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisintegra]{Disintegrate} spell, transporting the armor to the Positive Energy Plane, or by throwing the armor into the heart of a volcano.

Ruinous Energy.name: Ruinous Energy
Ruinous Energy.description:
The graveknight presented here is infused with Cold, but others are infused with Acid, Electricity, or Fire. The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy, and its attacks and Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Foundry Note

This actor contains Active Effects for each type of Ruinous Energy which can be activated for its effects.

Ruinous Cold Energy.name: Ruinous Cold Energy
Ruinous Cold Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Acid Energy.name: Ruinous Acid Energy
Ruinous Acid Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Electric Energy.name: Ruinous Electric Energy
Ruinous Electric Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Fire Energy.name: Ruinous Fire Energy
Ruinous Fire Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description: The graveknight casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplPhantomSte]{Phantom Steed}, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

Phantom Steed.name: 魅影驹
Phantom Steed.description:
一匹拟真的大型@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbsumPhantomSte]{马形生物}出现在施法距离内你选择的一处地面上的未占据空间中。你决定该生物的样貌，且它装备着鞍座、嚼子和缰绳。这些随法术创造的装备一旦离开坐骑 10 尺即化作一阵烟消失不见。

在法术持续时间内，你或者一名你指定的生物可以骑乘此坐骑。坐骑使用@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobRidingHors]的数据（见附录 B），不过其具有 100 尺速度，每小时可行进 13 里。法术终止时，坐骑会慢慢消失，骑手有 1 分钟的时间下马。坐骑受到伤害时，法术将提前终止。

Ruinous Cold Energy.name: Ruinous Cold Energy
Ruinous Cold Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Acid Energy.name: Ruinous Acid Energy
Ruinous Acid Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Electric Energy.name: Ruinous Electric Energy
Ruinous Electric Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ruinous Fire Energy.name: Ruinous Fire Energy
Ruinous Fire Energy.description: The graveknight is immune to the damage type of its Ruinous Energy and its Devastating Blast deal an extra 13 (3d8) damage of this type.

Ghostglass Golem.name: Ghostglass Golem
Ghostglass Golem.description: Some golem crafters build golems from magically empowered glass and treated lead, as these glass golems are exceptionally sharp. In the early days of Nhimbaloth's worship in hidden places on Golarion, some of her priests formed glass golems that could slice not only flesh, but souls. These "ghostglass" golems were deemed a remarkable improvement for their loyalty and durability.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The golem makes two [[/item Blade]] attacks.

Blade.name: 斩击
Blade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature other than a Construct or Undead, it suffers a bleeding wound. While suffering from a bleeding wound, the target loses [[/damage 1d8 average]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. A creature can suffer from multiple bleeding wounds. Any creature can take an action to stanch one wound with a successful [[/skill med 15]] check. All wounds close if the target regains any Hit Points.

Bleeding.name: 流血
Bleeding.description: The target suffers a bleeding wound. While suffering from a bleeding wound, the target loses [[/damage 1d8 average]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns.

Grim Glittering.name: Grim Glittering
Grim Glittering.description: The golem creates waves of baleful light that shed Dim Light in a 60-foot Emanation originating from the golem until the start of the golem’s next turn. While the light lasts, a creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its there is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the golem’s next turn. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also has Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Blinded.name: 目盲
Blinded.description: The target has the Blinded condition until the end of the golem’s next turn.

Glittering Disadvantage.name: Glittering Disadvantage
Glittering Disadvantage.description: If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature also has Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws until it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

Reflect Spell.name: 反射法术
Reflect Spell.description:
Trigger: A creature the golem can see hits the golem with a spell attack.

Response: The golem attempts to reflect the spell back at that caster. The golem makes a Dexterity (Acrobatics) check against a DC equal to the result of the triggering attack roll. On a success, the spell targets the caster instead of the golem, using the spell slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

Fire Absorption.name: 火焰吸收
Fire Absorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Fire damage dealt.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Shuln.name: Shuln
Shuln.description: Scourges of the upper Darklands, these enormous, mole-like monstrosities slice and burrow through solid stone with massive forearms and adamantine-strong claws. Shulns grow to about 20 feet long and have four tiny, nearly imperceptible eyes; a long, pale snout; four thick, muscled legs that end in long, serrated claws; and a stubby pink tail. As a young shuln matures, its unique metabolism produces adamantine that becomes infused throughout its skeletal system. In addition to making their claws and fangs nearly unbreakable, this unique physiological trait makes shulns unparalleled burrowers and highly sought by monster hunters who hope to harvest the precious material from their corpses. Shulns have a ravenous appetite and eat nearly anything they can catch, but their preferred diet consists almost entirely of large invertebrates, especially cave worms.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour and is &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] while &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] in this way.

Gas Curl.name: Gas Curl
Gas Curl.description:
Trigger: The shuln fails a saving throw against an effect that would give it the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition.

Response: The shuln curls into a ball and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The shuln then rerolls the save and uses the second result.

Unstoppable Tunneler.name: Unstoppable Tunneler
Unstoppable Tunneler.description: The shuln can burrow through solid rock and metal at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: The shuln has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The shuln makes three attacks: one with its [[/item Bite]] and two with its [[/item Claws]].

Caligni Creeper.name: Caligni Creeper
Caligni Creeper.description: The mischievous caligni creepers are the calignis most commonly encountered by surface folk.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The caligni deals an extra 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) damage when they hit a target with an attack and have Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the caligni that doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition and the caligni doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Death Flare.name: Death Flare
Death Flare.description:
The caligni combusts in a flash of bright light when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LC8fOhtpD4eyJGCx]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LC8fOhtpD4eyJGCx]]-foot Emanation originating from the caligni. Creatures with the [[/item Sunlight Sensitivity]] trait make the save with Disadvantage.

Failure: The creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the condition on a success.

Failure or Success: Anything the caligni is wearing or carrying falls to the ground unharmed.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The caligni casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .XDkLke0uAP2L8Cqo]]{Darkness}, [[/item .cUDYRlK9Z30ke9Sk]]{Detect Magic}

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, the caligni has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) to enable in the Effects tab that automatically grants disadvantage to ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply advantage to attack rolls at this time. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Death Aura.name: Death Aura
Death Aura.description:
Creatures have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws while within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JDZr04dv14VlYWuz]] feet of the bodak.

A humanoid that dies within [[lookup @range.value activity=5gEkxnRxFn9Jcd4p]] feet of the bodak rises as an autonomous Bodak after 24 hours.

utility.condition: If there are creatures making death saves

Death Aura.name: Death Aura
Death Aura.description: Creatures have Disadvantage on Death Saving Throws while within 60 feet of the bodak.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the bodak has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. If the bodak ends its turn in sunlight, they gain 1 level of Exhaustion. The bodak recovers 1 level of Exhaustion each minute it spends in Darkness.

Detect Life.name: 侦测生命
Detect Life.description: The bodak can magically sense the presence of living creatures within 60 feet of it.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The bodak uses [[/item Death Gaze]] and makes a [[/item Claws]] attack.

Death Gaze.name: 死亡凝视
Death Gaze.description:
The bodak stares at a creature they can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] feet of it. If that creature isn’t a Construct or Undead, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] Constitution.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

Success: Half damage only.

Draining Glance.name: Draining Glance
Draining Glance.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]], one creature the bodak can see within 30 feet, Constructs and Undead are immune to this effect.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Save.name: 豁免
Save.chatFlavor: 失败或成功：目标的生命值上限减少等于其受到伤害的数值。

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane while on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

Frightening Appearance.name: Frightening Appearance
Frightening Appearance.description:
When the poltergeist enters the Material Plane from the Ethereal Plane, each creature that can see them in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the poltergeist is subjected to the following effect. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the Frightened condition on itself on a success.

Success: The creature is immune to this poltergeist’s Frightening Appearance for the next 24 hours.

save.condition: Enters the Material Plane from the Ethereal Plane

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. They take [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if they end their turn inside an object.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item Telekinetic Object]] attacks.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

Telekinetic Object.name: Telekinetic Object
Telekinetic Object.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] (depending on the object). If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 13.

Failure: The target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the poltergeist and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

save.condition: If the target of the attack was a creature

Telekinetic Storm.name: Telekinetic Storm
Telekinetic Storm.description:
Dozens of objects whirl around the poltergeist in a storm of rage.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the poltergeist.

Failure: 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage, 7 (2d6) Piercing damage, and 7 (2d6) Slashing damage and the target has the Prone condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Telekinetic Defense.name: Telekinetic Defense
Telekinetic Defense.description: Trigger: A creature the poltergeist can see enters a space within 10 feet of it. Response: The poltergeist makes a [[/item Telekinetic Object]] attack against the creature.

Bloodsiphon.name: Bloodsiphon
Bloodsiphon.description: This devious creation of Belcorra’s apprentice, Volluk Azrinae, can be found in area B5 on the second level of the Abomination Vaults.

Death Burst.name: 自爆
Death Burst.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes in a burst of dried, necrotic blood [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes makes two [[/item Necrotic Blood]] attacks.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

While Grappling a creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t attack. Instead, at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, the target loses [[/heal average activity=Vz6PnYi8JHDM3Yli]] Hit Points from blood loss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains [[/heal temp average activity=hM8yqdGBH8aU0vTm]].

Necrotic Blood.name: Necrotic Blood
Necrotic Blood.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Wn6RCo8ga4GPLZhw]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: The creature has the Poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

H77Z7DTQhbTFFNya.name: 中毒
H77Z7DTQhbTFFNya.description: The target is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Canker Cultist.name: Canker Cultist
Canker Cultist.description: Canker cultist ghouls draw mystical power from their reverence for rotting flesh.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature that isn’t an Undead or elf, it subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9bm3PrfY0g1y0OKN]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，直至下一回合结束。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The ghoul casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .ryz0y4ueZaqaagIp]]{Chill Touch}, [[/item .Zvg8vLZKbfX4G8Io]]{Eldritch Blast}, [[/item .wTgViZA4V0ArQblh]]{Mage Hand}

2/Day Each: [[/item .m5csfLuEr4U0a4wA]]{Command}, [[/item .Onv2mur1rIKWyGfz]]{Inflict Wounds}, [[/item .yIpgRKTTwrRbZsXR]]{Mage Armor} (included in AC), [[/item .kF6X0oKAQ8qCbkk6]]{Ray of Enfeeblement}, [[/item .igimcHki6Op281v3]]{Unseen Servant}

Consume Flesh.name: Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description: The ghoul devours a chunk of flesh from the corpse of a non-Construct creature that died within the past hour. The ghoul regains [[/heal activity=xcqASSgitWKa8f77]] if the creature was Undead, or [[/heal activity=TcaClDwK9aF3xUfW]] if it was any other creature. The ghoul can’t regain Hit Points from that corpse again.

Chill Touch.name: 颤栗之触
Chill Touch.description:
你引导出来自坟墓的刺骨阴冷，对目标进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，目标将受到 1d10 点暗蚀伤害，并且直至你下一回合的结束前都无法恢复生命值。

戏法强化： 法术的伤害会在你到达下列等级时增加 1d10：5 级（2d10）、11 级（3d10）以及 17 级（4d10）。

Blocked Healing.name: 无法恢复生命值
Blocked Healing.description: 你无法恢复生命值直至施法者的下一回合结束。

Eldritch Blast.name: Eldritch Blast
Eldritch Blast.description:
你释放出一束爆裂能量射线，对施法距离内一名生物或一个物件发动一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标将受 [[/damage 1d10 type=force]]伤害。

戏法强化：到达 5 级后此法术将创造出两条射线，11 级后三条，17 级后四条。你可以使这些射线攻击同一个目标或分别攻击不同的目标。你需要为每条射线分别进行攻击检定。

[[(floor((@details.level+1)/6)+1)]]{射线总数}

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. Choose the command from these options:

Approach. The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop. The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee. The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel. The target has the Prone condition and then ends its turn.

Halt. On its turn, the target doesn't move and takes no action or Bonus Action.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

Inflict Wounds.name: 致伤术
Inflict Wounds.description:
你迫使触碰的一名生物进行体质豁免检定，豁免失败将受到 [[/damage 2d10 type=necrotic]]伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法：你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，暗蚀伤害就增加 1d10。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你触碰一个未着装护甲的自愿生物。直至法术终止前，目标的基础AC变为 13 + 它的敏捷调整值。当目标穿上护甲时，此法术将提前终止。

Mage Armor.name: 法师护甲
Mage Armor.description: 你的基础 AC 变为 13 + 你的敏捷调整值。着装护甲则该法术提前终止。

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: 衰弱射线
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
你向施法距离内的一名生物射出一道让人衰弱的能量射线。目标必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免成功，则目标直到你的下个回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有&Reference[disadvantage]{劣势}。

豁免失败，目标在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复豁免，豁免成功则法术终止。

Brief Enfeeblement.name: 短暂衰弱
Brief Enfeeblement.description: 你直至你的下一回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

Enervated.name: 无力
Enervated.description: 你在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复[[/save ability=con]]{豁免}，豁免成功则法术终止。

Unseen Servant.name: 隐形仆役
Unseen Servant.description:
This spell creates an Invisible, mindless, shapeless, Medium force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends. The servant springs into existence in an unoccupied space on the ground within range. It has AC 10, 1 Hit Point, and a Strength of 2, and it can't attack. If it drops to 0 Hit Points, the spell ends.

Once on each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can mentally command the servant to move up to 15 feet and interact with an object. The servant can perform simple tasks that a human could do, such as fetching things, cleaning, mending, folding clothes, lighting fires, serving food, and pouring drinks. Once you give the command, the servant performs the task to the best of its ability until it completes the task, then waits for your next command.

If you command the servant to perform a task that would move it more than 60 feet away from you, the spell ends.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The hulk makes two [[/item Claws]] attacks.

Shanrigol Behemoth.name: Shanrigol Behemoth
Shanrigol Behemoth.description:
Shanrigols that grow with the additions of many living victims can become truly enormous in size and pose a greater danger in their expanding hunting territory. Subterranean communities will collapse tunnels to stop a shanrigol behemoth from reaching their settlements.

Many shanrigol behemoths absorb enough brain matter to form crude intelligences and take a serpentine or humanoid shape. They’re more varied in their abilities than shanrigol heaps, as they often gain abilities from their constituent creatures. The shanrigol behemoth presented below contains flesh from driders and urdefhans, giving it a web attack and necrotic decay ability. Not all shanrigol behemoths have these two abilities, but should have other abilities to replace them.

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 18).

Web.name: 蛛网
Web.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature the shanrigol can see within 60 feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10, HP 15; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

Hungry Slap.name: Hungry Slap
Hungry Slap.description:
Trigger: A creature within 10 feet of the shanrigol hits or misses it with an attack.

Response: The shanrigol makes a [[/item Slam]] attack against the creature.

Aberrant Unlife.name: Aberrant Unlife
Aberrant Unlife.description: The shanrigol is treated as both an Aberration and Undead creature for effects that rely on creature type.

Necrotic Decay.name: Necrotic Decay
Necrotic Decay.description:
When the shanrigol dies, its flesh sublimates into noxious gas.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the shanrigol.

Failure: 28 (8d6) Necrotic damage.

Success: Half damage.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The shanrigol makes two [[/item Slam]] attacks or two [[/item Bone Shard]] attacks. In place of one attack, it can use Sapping Squeeze or Web.

Sapping Squeeze.name: Sapping Squeeze
Sapping Squeeze.description:
One creature &Reference[Grappled apply=false] by the shanrigol takes [[/damage average]] damage and is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18.

Failure: The creature takes [[/damage average activity=RPJ34us9ytncodBv]] damage, and the shanrigol regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Undulating Step.name: Undulating Step
Undulating Step.description: The shanrigol moves up to its Speed. During this movement, the shanrigol &Reference[Difficult Terrain] doesn’t cost the shanrigol extra movement, and the shanrigol can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

Mitflit Boss.name: Mitflit Boss
Mitflit Boss.description:
Boss Skrawng (LE male mitflit gang boss) is the leader of the Mudlicker mitflit gremlins.

A mitflit with the ingenuity to both bully others and cajole loyalty rises to the boss of a mitflit gang.

Hatred.name: Hatred
Hatred.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on attack rolls against dwarves and gnomes.

Keen Smell.name: Keen Smell
Keen Smell.description: [[lookup @name]] has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Self-Loathing.name: Self-Loathing
Self-Loathing.description: [[lookup @name]] has Disadvantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

Speak with Arthropods.name: Speak with Arthropods
Speak with Arthropods.description: [[lookup @name]] can communicate simple concepts to arthropods when they speak in Undercommon.

Vengeful.name: 睚眦必报
Vengeful.description:
Trigger: A creature [[lookup @name]] can see hits them with an attack.

Response: [[lookup @name]] makes a [[/item Short Trident]] attack against the creature.

utility.condition: A creature Boss Skrawng can see hits them with an attack.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Tearing Rend.name: Tearing Rend
Tearing Rend.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] hits the same creature with two or more [[/item Claw]]{claws} on the same turn, they deal that creature an additional [[/damage average]] damage.

affects.special: that the derghodaemon has hit witch two or more claws on the same turn

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes four [[/item Claw]] attacks.

Swarming Infestation.name: Swarming Infestation
Swarming Infestation.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the derghodaemon can see within 60 feet.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] Piercing damage immediately and [[/damage average activity=YaFHjeNW7oHMja30]] Piercing damage at the end of the target's next turn.

Success: Half initial damage only.

affects.special: that failed their saving throw against Swarming Infestation

Swarming Infestation.name: Swarming Infestation
Swarming Infestation.description: Creatures that fail their saving throw against Swarming Infestation take an additional [[/r 6d6]] Piercing damage at the end of their next turn.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .rkyyzyONBBgtL7Ng]]{Detect Evil and Good} (Celestial and Fiends only), [[/item .fvY6nlz84Mwc1M2n]]{Insect Plague}, [[/item .jkduOVAd8Tgebleg]]{See Invisibility}

2/Day Each: [[/item .peJ7dct0mbLdLW0I]]{Dimension Door}, [[/item .euRVBDHp7K5ucbs8]]{Dispel Magic}

1/Day Each: [[/item .g0n7wl9mOKZnkR61]]{Confusion}

Detect Evil and Good.name: 侦测善恶
Detect Evil and Good.description:
在法术持续时间内，你定位距你 30 尺内任何异怪、天族、元素、妖精、邪魔、亡灵。你也可以感知到范围内是否具有激活的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000] 并确定其位置。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

See Invisibility.name: 识破隐形
See Invisibility.description: 在法术持续时间内，你能看见任何 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 的生物和物件，如同其处于正常可见状态一样。你还能够看见以太位面，以太位面的生物和物件在你眼中会以幽灵般的半透明形状显现。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Dimension Door.name: 任意门
Dimension Door.description:
你将传送至施法距离内的一处地点。你会准确到达该目的地。法术的目的地可以是你能看见的、可想象的地点，也可以是通过距离和方向说明的地点，比如“径直向下 200 尺”，“西北偏上 45 度 300 尺”。

你还可以带上一名自愿生物一同传送。该生物在你传送时必须距你 5 尺内，且其传送终点也位于你所选目的地的 5 尺内。

如果你、你携带的生物、或两者均将被传送至一处已被一名生物占据、或被一个或更多物件填满的空间中，则你和任何与你一起传送的生物都将受到 4d6 点力场伤害，且传送失败。

Insect Plague.name: 疫病虫群
Insect Plague.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并以该点为中心使半径 20 尺的球状区域内堆满成群的噬人蝗虫。虫群使整个区域成为 &Reference[DifficultTerrain] ，且处于 &Reference[LightlyObscured]，在法术终止前都会持续存在。

当虫群显现时，其区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d10 的穿刺伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入该区域内，或者在区域内结束其回合时，也必须进行该豁免。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法：使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Confusion.name: 困惑术
Confusion.description:
你选择施法距离内一点为中心，半径 10 尺球状区域内的所有生物必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则目标不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在其每个回合开始时掷 1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比四环高一环，此法术的球状区域半径就增加 5 尺。

Confused.name: 困惑
Confused.description:
你不能执行反应和附赠动作，并且必须在你每个回合开始时掷1d10，根据下表内容来决定当前回合的行为。

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.tables24.RollTable.phbsplConfusionB rollable cite=false classes="caption-top"]{当前回合行为}

受影响的目标在其每个回合结束时，重新进行该 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功则其身上该法术的效应提前结束。

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the hand to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the hand clings to its throat. While clinging to the target, the hand moves with the target, and the target can’t speak. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the hand as an action.

Mark Quarry.name: Mark Quarry
Mark Quarry.description:
The hand can choose a quarry by touching a creature’s blood. If the hand lacks a quarry, it can mark any creature it hits with a [[/item Claw]] attack as its quarry.

The creature remains the hand’s quarry until it dies or until the hand gains a new quarry.

The hand has Advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to track its quarry, and it deals an extra [[/damage average]] damage when it hits its quarry with its [[/item Claw]] attack.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The caligni casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplResistance], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSparetheDy]

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAid0000000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBanishment], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateFood], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCreateorDe], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDeathWard0], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectEvil], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidingBol], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHoldPerson], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFlameStrik], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeroesFeas], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]

Death Flare.name: Death Flare
Death Flare.description:
The caligni explodes into brilliant motes of magical energy when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the caligni.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Anything the caligni is wearing or carrying falls to the ground unharmed.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The caligni deals an extra 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) damage when they hit a target with an attack and have Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the caligni that doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and the caligni doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。球状区域被&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被强风（比如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}创造的风）吹散。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Guidance.name: 神导术
Guidance.description: 你触碰一名自愿生物并选择一项技能。直到法术结束为止，受术生物在使用所选技能进行的所有属性检定上具有 1d4 加值。

Mending.name: 修复术
Mending.description:
该法术修复你所触碰一个物件上的一处破损或裂缝，例如修复一条断裂的链条、一把碎成两半的钥匙、一件撕裂的斗篷、一个漏了的酒袋等。只要破损或断裂处在任意方向上都不超过 1 尺，你就可以不留痕迹地修复它。

该法术可以物理性地修复一件魔法物品，但无法恢复其上的魔法。

Resistance.name: 抗性
Resistance.description: 你触碰一名自愿生物并选择一种伤害类型：强酸、钝击、寒冷、火焰、闪电、暗蚀、穿刺、毒素、光耀、挥砍、雷鸣。在此法术结束之前，每当该生物受到所选类型伤害时，那名生物所受的总伤害减少 1d4。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Acid Protection.name: 防护强酸
Acid Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Bludgeoning Protection.name: 抵抗钝击
Bludgeoning Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Cold Protection.name: 防护寒冷
Cold Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Fire Protection.name: 防护火焰
Fire Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Lightning Protection.name: 防护闪电
Lightning Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Necrotic Protection.name: 抵抗暗蚀
Necrotic Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Piercing Protection.name: 抵抗穿刺
Piercing Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Poison Protection.name: 抵抗毒素
Poison Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Radiant Protection.name: 抵抗光耀
Radiant Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Slashing Protection.name: 抵抗挥砍
Slashing Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Thunder Protection.name: 防护雷鸣
Thunder Protection.description: 当你在法术结束之前受到了所选类型的伤害，你将自身受到的总伤害减去 [[/r 1d4]]。一名生物一回合只能受到一次该法术的增益。

Spare the Dying.name: 维生术
Spare the Dying.description:
选择一个生命值为 0 但还未死亡的生物，使该生物变为伤势稳定。

戏法强化：到达特定等级后，此法术的施法距离将翻倍：5 级（30 尺），11 级（60 尺），17 级（120 尺）。

affects.special: 生命值为 0 但还未死亡

Aid.name: 援助术
Aid.description:
Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

Level 2: +5 Max HP.name: 2 环：生命值上限 +5
Level 2: +5 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 3: +10 Max HP.name: 3 环：生命值上限 +10
Level 3: +10 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 4: +15 Max HP.name: 4 环：生命值上限 +15
Level 4: +15 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 5: +20 Max HP.name: 5 环：生命值上限 +20
Level 5: +20 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 6: +25 Max HP.name: 6 环：生命值上限 +25
Level 6: +25 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 7: +30 Max HP.name: 7 环：生命值上限 +30
Level 7: +30 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 8: +35 Max HP.name: 8 环：生命值上限 +35
Level 8: +35 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Level 9: +40 Max HP.name: 9 环：生命值上限 +40
Level 9: +40 Max HP.description: 持续时间内，你的生命值上限增加。

Banishment.name: 放逐
Banishment.description:
One creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be transported to a harmless demiplane for the duration.
