While there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is an Aberration, a Celestial, an Elemental, a Fey, or a Fiend, the target doesn't return if the spell lasts for 1 minute. The target is instead transported to a random location on a plane (DM's choice) associated with its creature type.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 4.

Banished.name: 放逐
Banished.description:
身处半位面期间，目标会陷入&Reference[Incapacitated apply=false]状态。当法术终止时，目标将重新出现在其被放逐前的位置。如果该位置被占据，则目标将出现在距离该位置最近的一个未被占据空间。

若该目标的生物类型为异怪、天族、元素、妖精或邪魔，则在法术持续一分钟后，目标不会返回。该目标会被改为转移到与其生物类型相关的一个位面（由DM决定）中的随机地点。

Create Food and Water.name: 造粮术
Create Food and Water.description: 你在施法距离内的地面上或容器中创造 45 磅食物和 30 加仑淡水，该法术创造的食物和水均可用于避免饥饿和脱水 的危害。食物味道寡淡却营养丰富，并且看起来像一种你选择的食物，水也是干净的。食物 24 小时内未被食用即会变坏。

Create or Destroy Water.name: 造水术/枯水术
Create or Destroy Water.description:
你选择其一执行：

造水术。 你在施法距离内一个打开的容器中创造至多10加仑干净的水。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一处30尺的立方区域降下雨水并浇灭区域内不受遮盖的火焰。

枯水术。你使施法距离内一个打开的容器里至多10加仑水枯竭不见。作为另一种选项，你使施法距离内一片30尺立方 区域的浓雾消失不见。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就多创造或多枯竭10加仑额外的水分，另一种选项能影响的立方 区域边长增加5尺。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
你触碰的一名生物恢复等同于 2d8 + 你施法属性调整值点生命值。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d8 点。

Death Ward.name: 防死结界
Death Ward.description:
你触摸一名生物，并给予其对死亡的防护。在法术结束前，当目标的生命值首次降至 0 时，该目标的生命值改为降至 1，随后法术终止。

目标受到直接致死而不造成伤害的效应影响时，若该法术仍在生效，则改为目标受到的致死效应失效，随后法术终止。

Protection from Death.name: 防死结界
Protection from Death.description:
在法术结束前，当你的生命值首次降至 0 时，该你的生命值改为降至 1，随后法术终止。

你受到直接致死而不造成伤害的效应影响时，若该法术仍在生效，则改为你受到的致死效应失效，随后法术终止。

Detect Evil and Good.name: 侦测善恶
Detect Evil and Good.description:
在法术持续时间内，你定位距你 30 尺内任何异怪、天族、元素、妖精、邪魔、亡灵。你也可以感知到范围内是否具有激活的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000] 并确定其位置。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
你向施法距离内的一名生物掷出一道光箭。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受 4d6 点光耀伤害。在你下个回合结束前，对目标发动的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就增加 1d6。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description: 在施法者下一回合结束前，对你发动的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Flame Strike.name: 焰击术
Flame Strike.description:
一支辉煌火焰的立柱从上方呼啸着降落。位于以施法范围内一点为中心，半径 10 尺、高 40 尺柱状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免。豁免失败者将受到 5d6 点火焰伤害和 5d6点光耀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比五环高一环，其火焰伤害和光耀伤害就均增加 1d6。

Heroes' Feast.name: 英雄宴
Heroes' Feast.description:
你咒唤一场盛宴出现在你周围地面上未被占据的 10 尺立方空间。盛宴需要 1 小时来享用，并会在这段时间结束后消失不见，而且下述增益效应在这 1 小时结束前不会生效。你可以让至多十二个生物一同分享盛宴。

所有享用了大餐的生物都会获得几种增益，持续 24 小时。该生物获得毒素伤害的&Reference[damageResistance]{抗性}，以及对&Reference[Frightened]状态和&Reference[Poisoned]状态的免疫。它的生命值上限提高[[/damage 2d10 average]]点，并获得等量的生命值。

materials.value: 一个价值 1000+GP 的镶饰宝石的碗，作为法术耗材

Consume Feast.name: 享用盛宴
Consume Feast.chatFlavor: 生命值上限也将提高 2d10 点，并获得等量的生命值。

Feast's Benefits.name: 大快朵颐
Feast's Benefits.description: 所有享用了大餐的生物都会获得几种增益。这些生物对毒素伤害具有 &Reference[damageResistance]{抗性}，免疫 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 和 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，生命值上限也将提高 2d10 点，并获得等量的生命值。这些增益将持续 24 小时。

Insect Plague.name: 疫病虫群
Insect Plague.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并以该点为中心使半径 20 尺的球状区域内堆满成群的噬人蝗虫。虫群使整个区域成为 &Reference[DifficultTerrain] ，且处于 &Reference[LightlyObscured]，在法术终止前都会持续存在。

当虫群显现时，其区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d10 的穿刺伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入该区域内，或者在区域内结束其回合时，也必须进行该豁免。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法：使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, the caligni has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Wand of Lightning Bolts.name: Wand of Lightning Bolts
Wand of Lightning Bolts.description:
Wand, Rare (Requires Attunement by a Spellcaster)

This wand has 7 charges. While holding it, you can expend no more than 3 charges to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt} (save DC 15) from it. For 1 charge, you cast the level 3 version of the spell. You can increase the spell's level by 1 for each additional charge you expend.

Regaining Charges. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

Lightning Bolt.name: 闪电束
Lightning Bolt.description:
一束 100 尺长，5 尺宽的线状闪电从你的位置向你指定的任意方向爆发迸出。在线状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败者将受到 8d6 的闪电伤害，豁免成功则受到半数伤害。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比三环高一环，伤害就增加 1d6。

materials.value: 一些毛皮和一把水晶权杖

Feast's Benefits.name: 大快朵颐
Feast's Benefits.description: 所有享用了大餐的生物都会获得几种增益。这些生物对毒素伤害具有 &Reference[damageResistance]{抗性}，免疫 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 和 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，生命值上限也将提高 2d10 点，并获得等量的生命值。这些增益将持续 24 小时。

Claimed Corpse.name: Claimed Corpse
Claimed Corpse.description: 指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures 提供。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: While they inhabit a corpse, the corpselight makes two [[/item Slam]] attacks.

Death Light.name: Death Light
Death Light.description:
While they inhabit a corpse, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a sickly blue beam of light from their mouth and eyes.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Es62fSCflAaxlRlL]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Es62fSCflAaxlRlL]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=Es62fSCflAaxlRlL]]. Constructs and Undead automatically succeed on the save.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. If at least one creature in the beam fails its saving throw, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/heal average]], gaining any Hit Points that exceed their Hit Point maximum as Temporary Hit Points that last for 1 minute.

Success: Half damage only.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态直至下一回合结束。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes 2 attacks.

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 12).

Sapping Squeeze.name: Sapping Squeeze
Sapping Squeeze.description:
One creature &Reference[Grappled apply=false] by the shanrigol takes 7 (2d4 + 2) Bludgeoning damage and is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12.

Failure: The creature takes 4 (1d8) Necrotic damage, and the shanrigol regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Undulating Step.name: Undulating Step
Undulating Step.description: The shanrigol moves up to its Speed. During this movement, the shanrigol &Reference[Difficult Terrain] doesn’t cost the shanrigol extra movement, and the shanrigol can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

Drow Shootist.name: Drow Shootist
Drow Shootist.description: Drow who specialize in the repeating hand crossbow command respect for their skill and swagger.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The drow casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: [[/item .gNq2FqZR833L6SSb]]{Dancing Lights}

1/Day Each: [[/item .N8tAWRPJlYTihGL4]]{Darkness} , [[/item .JoCy1MX8fvBqV0y2]]{Faerie Fire}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The drow attacks twice with their [[/item Elven Curve Blade]] or twice with their [[/item Repeating Hand Crossbow]].

Repeating Hand Crossbow.name: Repeating Hand Crossbow
Repeating Hand Crossbow.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition while it remains Poisoned. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[poisoned apply=false] 状态 1 小时。

Unconscious.name: 昏迷
Unconscious.description: If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition while it remains &Reference[Poisoned apply=false].

Shootist’s Bandolier.name: Shootist’s Bandolier
Shootist’s Bandolier.description: The drow reloads their repeating hand crossbow.

Indomitable.name: Indomitable
Indomitable.description: If the drow fails a saving throw, they can reroll it with a +5 bonus.

Saves +5.name: Saves +5
Saves +5.description: If the drow fails a saving throw, they can reroll it with a +5 bonus.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The drow deals an extra 17 ([[/r 5d6]]) damage when they hit a target with an attack and have Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the drow that doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition and the drow doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Reload Trick.name: Reload Trick
Reload Trick.description: If the drow’s [[/item Repeating Hand Crossbow]] is empty, they reload it and make one attack with it. If the target hasn’t seen the drow use Reload Trick before, the drow makes the attack with Advantage.

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术
Dancing Lights.description:
You create up to four torch-size lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover for the duration. Alternatively, you combine the four lights into one glowing Medium form that is vaguely humanlike. Whichever form you choose, each light sheds Dim Light in a 10-foot radius.

As a Bonus Action, you can move the lights up to 60 feet to a space within range. A light must be within 20 feet of another light created by this spell, and a light vanishes if it exceeds the spell's range.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Faerie Fire.name: 妖火
Faerie Fire.description:
Objects in a 20-foot Cube within range are outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Each creature in the Cube is also outlined if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can't benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Outlined.name: 示廓
Outlined.description:
For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed &Reference[dimlight] in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.

Attack rolls against an affected creature or object have Advantage if the attacker can see it.

Fey Ancestry.name: 精类血统
Fey Ancestry.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can’t put it to sleep.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) to enable in the Effects tab that applies disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Augrael has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Caligni Priest.name: Caligni Priest
Caligni Priest.description: Priests aid caligni custodians in managing a congregation of caligni worshipers. They rarely have true divine power, instead leveraging occult abilities.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The caligni casts one of the following spells, using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .LKemCcQiDoQ0aCFK]]{Chill Touch} , [[/item .a0zCfttyFumNTyk3]]{Darkness} , [[/item .niFxvqwcZ9uoc8k0]]{Detect Magic} , [[/item .0732TwDiyzQjhcmZ]]{Fog Cloud}

2/Day Each: [[/item .laj0pCFqIBSQnPAc]]{Shield}

1/Day Each: [[/item .EkCT03ZfNCyNuIr4]]{Blindness/Deafness} , [[/item .sdr1RYcNHO4IqJOa]]{Enthrall} , [[/item .hBmWX6UTr73DYzBC]]{Hold Person} , [[/item .gOjBNu9Bpsx2OTvl]]{Invisibility} , [[/item .WyocrD5rfWDZgtNk]]{Suggestion}

Occult Ward.name: Occult Ward
Occult Ward.description:
Trigger: The caligni fails a saving throw against a spell.

Response: The caligni draws a simple icon in the air and adds 3 to the result of their save, possibly causing the save to succeed.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The caligni makes two [[/item Dagger]] attacks.

Fog Cloud.name: 云雾术
Fog Cloud.description:
你以施法距离内一点为中心创造一片半径 20 尺的球状浓雾。球状区域被&Reference[heavilyobscured]{重度遮蔽}浓雾持续至法术持续时间结束，但仍可被强风（比如@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{造风术}创造的风）吹散。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，浓雾的半径就增加 20 尺。

Darkness.name: 黑暗术
Darkness.description:
For the duration, magical &Reference[darkness] spreads from a point within range and fills a 15-foot-radius Sphere. Darkvision can't see through it, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

Alternatively, you cast the spell on an object that isn't being worn or carried, causing the Darkness to fill a 15-foot Emanation originating from that object. Covering that object with something opaque, such as a bowl or helm, blocks the Darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of Bright Light or Dim Light created by a spell of level 2 or lower, that other spell is dispelled.

Blindness/Deafness.name: 目盲术/耳聋术
Blindness/Deafness.description:
处于你施法范围内的一个你可见的生物必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败者在法术持续期间陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 或 &Reference[Deafened apply=false] 状态（由你选择）。目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复此豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blindness.name: 目盲
Blindness.description: 目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

Deafness.name: 耳聋
Deafness.description: 目标可以在其每个回合结束时重复 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免，豁免成功则终止在其身上的此法术。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell's school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: An imperceptible barrier of magical force protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

activation.condition: 当你被攻击命中或被作为魔法飞弹法术的目标时执行

Imperceptible Barrier.name: 无形护盾
Imperceptible Barrier.description: 在你的下一回合开始前，你的 AC 具有 +5 加值（在触发该法术的攻击之前生效），并且不会受 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi] 的伤害。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Enthrall.name: 注目术
Enthrall.description: 你编排一段使人分心的话语，指定施法距离内任何你能看见的生物。目标生物必须进行一次感知豁免。如果你或你的同伴正在和目标生物战斗，则其自动成功于该豁免。豁免失败时，目标直到法术终止之前进行的感知（察觉）检定与被动察觉 值具有 -10 减值。

Distracted.name: 分神
Distracted.description: 你直至法术终止之前在 [[/check ability=wis skill=prc]] 检定和被动察觉上具有 -10 减值。

Chill Touch.name: 颤栗之触
Chill Touch.description:
你引导出来自坟墓的刺骨阴冷，对目标进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，目标将受到 1d10 点暗蚀伤害，并且直至你下一回合的结束前都无法恢复生命值。

戏法强化： 法术的伤害会在你到达下列等级时增加 1d10：5 级（2d10）、11 级（3d10）以及 17 级（4d10）。

Blocked Healing.name: 无法恢复生命值
Blocked Healing.description: 你无法恢复生命值直至施法者的下一回合结束。

Suggestion.name: 暗示术
Suggestion.description:
你以魔法影响施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，并对其施以某种行动暗示（不超过 25 个词）。由你指定的受术目标必须能听到并理解你的话语。暗示必须听起来可行，也不涉及明显会对目标及其盟友造成伤害的内容。比如说，你可以说“把邪教的宝库钥匙找来，然后给我。”或者：“别打了，让图书馆保持安静，然后出去别回来。”

目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免，否则在法术持续时间内陷入&Reference[charmed]{魅惑}，若你或你的盟友对其造成伤害此法术将提前结束。被魅惑的生物会尽其所能地执行你所描述的行为。你所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果你所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在目标完成了你的要求后随即终止。

Pursuing Suggestion.name: 遵循暗示
Pursuing Suggestion.description: 被魅惑的你会尽其所能地执行施法者所描述的行为。施法者所暗示的行为可能会在法术持续时间内始终一直进行，而如果施法者所暗示的活动可以用更短的时间完成，则此法术会在你完成了施法者的要求后随即终止。

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, [[lookup @name]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) to enable in the Effects tab that applies disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Augrael has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The drow deals an extra 17 ([[/r 5d6]]) damage when they hit a target with an attack and have Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the drow that doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition and the drow doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Death Flare.name: Death Flare
Death Flare.description:
The caligni explodes in a burst of chilling shadow when it dies.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yekDKOgvxkYJYpGu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=yekDKOgvxkYJYpGu]]-foot Emanation originating from the caligni.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Anything the caligni is wearing or carrying falls to the ground unharmed.

Potion of Clairvoyance.name: 鹰眼术药水
Potion of Clairvoyance.description:
An eyeball bobs in this yellowish liquid but vanishes when the potion is opened.

When you drink this potion, you gain the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.cg50KpBkBdPK6vPL]{Clairvoyance} spell.

Augrael.name: Augrael
Augrael.description:
A creature of two worlds welcomed by neither, Augrael is a morlock ghoul exiled by his living kin among the Ghost Queen morlocks on the second level, yet not accepted by the Cult of the Canker ghouls. While he appears monstrous, he’s rational and even cordial.

Augrael can usually be found in area C1 on the third level of the Abomination Vaults. The characters might convince Augrael to accompany them as they explore that level.

Scuttling Stride.name: Scuttling Stride
Scuttling Stride.description: &Reference[Difficult Terrain] caused by rubble or uneven ground doesn’t cost [[lookup @name lowercase]] extra movement.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description:
While in sunlight, [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that imposes disadvantage on ability checks. However, there is currently no automation to apply disadvantage to attack rolls. This AE can serve as a reminder for that action.

Sunlight Sensitivity.name: 日照敏感
Sunlight Sensitivity.description: While in sunlight, Augrael has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature that isn’t an Undead or elf, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=P4gKtRSn3oWKg3Uf]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] 状态，直至下一回合结束。

Consume Flesh.name: Consume Flesh
Consume Flesh.description:
[[lookup @name]] devours a chunk of flesh from the corpse of a non-Construct creature that died within the past hour.

He regains [[/heal activity=fKocJXJI5EuhAQ9s]] if the creature was Undead, or [[/heal activity=8ONuH5a90TohpxH7]] if it was any other creature. [[lookup @name]] can’t regain Hit Points from that corpse again.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The chuul makes two [[/item Pincer]] attacks and uses [[/item Paralyzing Tentacles]].

Pincer.name: 钳击
Pincer.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14) from one of two pincers.

Mind Feeding.name: Mind Feeding
Mind Feeding.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature with the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition within 5 feet of the chuul.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the chuul’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Paralyzing Tentacles.name: 麻痹触须
Paralyzing Tentacles.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature &Reference[Grappled apply=false] by the chuul.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

Swamp Stride.name: Swamp Stride
Swamp Stride.description: Difficult Terrain caused by swampy terrain doesn’t cost the chuul extra movement.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: 甲伏怪可以在空气和水中呼吸。

Sense Magic.name: 感知魔法
Sense Magic.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of themself. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic} spell but isn’t itself magical.

Urdefhan Death Scout.name: Urdefhan Death Scout
Urdefhan Death Scout.description: Other urdefhans scorn the death scouts’ stealthy methods, but none can argue with their results.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The urdefhan casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFeatherFal] (self only)

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili], @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee]

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature that isn’t an Undead or Construct, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12.

Failure: The target’s Hit Point maximum is reduced by [[/damage 1d10 average]] Hit Points, and the urdefhan regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Drink Blood.name: Drink Blood
Drink Blood.description: If the urdefhan has hit a creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead with a Shauth Blade attack this turn, the urdefhan drinks the creature’s blood from the blade. The urdefhan regains 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) Hit Points.

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Feather Fall.name: 羽落术
Feather Fall.description: 指定施法距离内至多五个正坠落的生物。受术生物的坠落速度在法术持续时间内降低至每回合 60 尺。如果该生物在法术终止前落地，则其不会受到任何坠落伤害，且着地后法术对该生物的效应随即终止。

activation.condition: 你或距你 60 尺内的可见生物坠落时可用

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description:
你触碰的一个生物进入 &Reference[invisible apply=false] 状态并维持至法术终止。如果目标进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Ray of Enfeeblement.name: 衰弱射线
Ray of Enfeeblement.description:
你向施法距离内的一名生物射出一道让人衰弱的能量射线。目标必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免成功，则目标直到你的下个回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有&Reference[disadvantage]{劣势}。

豁免失败，目标在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复豁免，豁免成功则法术终止。

Brief Enfeeblement.name: 短暂衰弱
Brief Enfeeblement.description: 你直至你的下一回合开始在下一次攻击掷骰上具有劣势。

Enervated.name: 无力
Enervated.description: 你在持续时间内在使用力量属性的 D20 检定上具有劣势。同样的，在此期间，其所有的伤害掷骰获得 1d8 的减值。目标在每个其回合结束时可以重复[[/save ability=con]]{豁免}，豁免成功则法术终止。

Necrotic Decay.name: Necrotic Decay
Necrotic Decay.description:
When the urdefhan dies, their flesh sublimates into noxious gas.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the urdefhan.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The urdefhan makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Shauth Blade]] attack.

Gulzash.name: Gulzash
Gulzash.description: A lizardfolk born and raised in the Darklands, Gulzash found a taste for music early in life. He created his own battle lute and traveled until he met and joined Shadow Malice. The others enjoy his eager violence, but dislike his strong personal odor. He swings his battle lute in combat with reckless glee.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Mosh.name: Mosh
Mosh.description: Gulzash moves up to half his Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and pushes a creature he can see within 5 feet of him. That creature must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Hold Breath.name: 屏息
Hold Breath.description: Gulzash can hold his breath for 15 minutes.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Gulzash makes two melee attacks, each with a different weapon.

Seugathi Servant.name: Seugathi Servant
Seugathi Servant.description: The most common seugathis spawned by neothelids are seugathi servants. Their masters equip them with tools useful in their tasks (often a wand and a weapon), and they rarely value other material things beyond their usefulness in their imprinted mission.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] in this way, the target also makes Wisdom saving throws with Disadvantage.

save.condition: When the target is a creature

Mind Fog.name: Mind Fog
Mind Fog.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the seugathi. Creatures immune to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition automatically succeed on the save.

Failure: The target can’t take Reactions until the end of their next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d8]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1–4. The target does nothing.

5–6. The target takes no action or Bonus Action and uses all its movement to move in a random direction.

7–8. The seugathi commands the target to move up to its Speed and make a melee attack against a creature of the seugathi’s choice.

Success: The target is immune to Mind Fog for 1 minute

Use Magic Device.name: 使用魔法装置
Use Magic Device.description: The seugathi ignores all class, species, and level requirements on the use of magic items.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The seugathi uses [[/item Mind Fog]], then makes two attacks: one with their [[/item Bite]] and one with their [[/item Shortsword]].

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The seugathi casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEldritchBl]{Eldritch Blast} (two beams), @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand}

2/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFly0000000]{Fly}

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法
Detect Magic.description:
在法术持续时间内，你感受到距你 30 尺内的魔法效应。若你感知到了此类效应，则你可以用一个魔法动作以看到任何带有此魔法的可见生物或物件周围环绕着微弱的灵光，且若此魔法属于被法术创造的效应，则你可分辨出其所属的魔法学派。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

Eldritch Blast.name: Eldritch Blast
Eldritch Blast.description:
You hurl two beams of crackling energy. Make a ranged spell attack against one creature or object in range. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Force damage.

Cantrip Upgrade. The spell creates two beams at level 5, three beams at level 11, and four beams at level 17. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
一只漂浮的幽灵手出现在施法距离内你指定的一点。幽灵手持续存在至法术终止。如果幽灵手距你的距离超过 30 尺，或者当你再次施展了该法术时，则现存的幽灵手消失不见。

你可以在施展该法术时使用幽灵手实施一个行为：你可以操控一个物件，或者打开一扇未上锁的门或容器，或者将一件物品放入或取出一个打开的容器，或者将小瓶中的内容物倾倒出来。

在后续的回合中，以一个魔法动作，你可以控制幽灵手再次实施一个行为。作为那个动作的一部分，你可以令幽灵手移动至多 30 尺。

该幽灵手不能攻击，也不能激活魔法物品或承载超过 10 磅重的物质。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Fly.name: 飞行术
Fly.description:
你触碰一个自愿生物。目标在法术持续时间内获得 60 尺的飞行速度且可以悬浮。法术终止时，如果目标仍在空中则随即坠落，除非其能停止坠落。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比三环高一环，就可以额外再指定一名生物作为法术目标。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The Child of Belcorra uses [[/item .r3ABIOFDCQlZtleL]] and makes one [[/item .ThwFDP8vT0PV3uo1]] attack.

Rotting Fist.name: 腐朽拳击
Rotting Fist.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed.

While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse.

A creature dies and decays into a foul-smelling sludge if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 若你为生物，则你被诅咒。受诅咒期间，你无法恢复生命值，也无法在完成长休时恢复生命值上限，并且诅咒每持续 24 小时，你生命值上限降低 [[/r 3d6#减少最大生命值]]{10 (3d6)}。若你因此攻击生命值降至 0，则你立即死亡并化为尘土。

Breathtaking Glare.name: Breathtaking Glare
Breathtaking Glare.description:
The Child of Belcorra targets one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] they can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet of them. If the target can see the Child, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]].

Failure: The target can’t breathe or speak. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Success: The target is immune to this Child of Belcorra’s Breathtaking Glare for the next 24 hours.

9q2zHwpczCAKxjUK.name: Breathtaking Glare
9q2zHwpczCAKxjUK.description: The creature can’t breathe or speak. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Swamp Stride.name: Swamp Stride
Swamp Stride.description:
&Reference[Difficult Terrain] caused by swampy terrain doesn’t cost the Child of Belcorra extra movement.

The Child of Belcorra has a +2 bonus to Stealth checks made in swamps.

Gnomish Cunning.name: Gnomish Cunning
Gnomish Cunning.description: The Child of Belcorra has Advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

Ambusher.name: Ambusher
Ambusher.description: In the first round of a combat, the Child of Belcorra has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that began the combat surprised.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]]对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Sneak Attack.name: Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description: The devil deals an extra [[/damage average]] damage when they hit a target with an attack and have Advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the devil that doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition and the devil doesn’t have Disadvantage on the attack roll.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes 2 [[/item .xE2PhqQfQm2Q8sOA]] attacks.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

If the target is a creature, it subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=s9zXpRBr8f6WJ50h]].

Failure: The target contracts a magical contagion called Cocytan Filth. The contagion has no effect for [[/r 1d4]] days. After that time, the creature’s Strength score is reduced by [[/r 1d4]], to a minimum score of 2. Each time the creature finishes a Long Rest thereafter, it repeats the saving throw. On a failed save, the creature’s Strength score is reduced by an additional [[/r 1d4]]. On a success, its Strength score is restored by [[/r 1d4]]. When the creature’s Strength score returns to normal, the contagion is cured.

Infernal Eye.name: Infernal Eye
Infernal Eye.description: The devil touches one willing creature and magically replays up to 10 minutes of events the devil has witnessed, which the creature receives in a flash of information. After relaying these visions, the accuser devil can’t recall those events again.

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: The devil has the Invisible condition until the devil’s Concentration ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the devil makes an attack roll.

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: The devil has the Invisible condition until the devil’s Concentration ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the devil makes an attack roll.

Soulbound Doll.name: Soulbound Doll
Soulbound Doll.description:
Soulbound dolls are eerie mannequins or playthings that have been imbued with a small piece of a deceased mortal’s soul. Soulbound dolls encountered by adventurers are typically guardians of some sort and possess a variety of different powers (such as the birdlike soulbound doll presented below, which can fly and attack with their beak).

The doll’s soul fragment resides in a focus gem typically embedded in their neck or chest. The soulbound doll’s focus gem often retains the doll’s memories even after the doll’s destruction. The intact soul focus gem of a destroyed doll can even be placed into a new doll body by someone knowledgeable about soulbound creatures, effectively reconstituting the soulbound doll.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using [[lookup @attributes.spell.abilityLabel]] as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]], +[[lookup @attributes.spell.attack]] to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: [[/item .YccCbYuqbrcHjFDJ]]{Light}, [[/item .FEGliHf93hjfP7K7]]{Mage Hand}, [[/item .ROUsRVlahnVvUDYh]]{Prestidigitation}

1/Day: [[/item .awvHx0vDrxsNoWfF]]{Vampiric Touch}

Mage Hand.name: 法师之手
Mage Hand.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

Prestidigitation.name: 魔法伎俩
Prestidigitation.description:
你在施法距离内创造一个魔法效应。从下述效应中选择一项。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的非即时效应。

感官效应。 你创造一个立即生效的，无害的感官效应，比如一束火花，一阵风，微弱音乐或古怪的臭味。

玩火。你立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

清洁或弄脏。 你立即清洁或弄脏一个不大于 1 立方尺的物件。

次级感官。 你使一个不大于 1 立方尺的无生命物质变冷、变暖或对其调味，持续 1 小时。

魔法印记。 你在一个物件或一个表面上创造一块色斑，一个小印记，或者一个徽记，持续 1 小时。

次级造物。 你创造出一个非魔法小饰品或一张虚幻图像，其大小不能超过你的手掌大小，它会持续存在至下个你的回合结束为止。一个小饰品不能造成伤害，也不值钱。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
You touch one Large or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried by someone else. Until the spell ends, the object sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like.

Covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again.

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Vampiric Touch.name: 吸血鬼之触
Vampiric Touch.description:
你的阴影环绕着的手可以吸取他人的生命力来为自己疗伤。对你触及范围内的一名生物进行一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到[[/damage 3d6 type=necrotic]]伤害，而你则恢复数值等同于所造成暗蚀伤害一半的生命值。

该法术终止前，你可以在你的每个回合内用&Reference[magic]{魔法}动作对相同或不同的生物进行一次这样的攻击。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比三环高一环，此法术的伤害就提高 1d6。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name]] makes two [[/item Beak]] attacks.

Chafkhem.name: Chafkhem
Chafkhem.description: Chafkhem is trapped in area E17, on the fifth level of the Abomination Vaults.

Staff of Swarming Insects.name: 虫群法杖
Staff of Swarming Insects.description:
@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbafcStaffalsoa]{Staff}, Rare (Requires Attunement by a Bard, Cleric, Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)

This staff has 10 charges.

Insect Cloud. While holding the staff, you can take a Magic action and expend 1 charge to cause a swarm of harmless flying insects to fill a 30-foot Emanation originating from you. The insects remain for 10 minutes, making the area &Reference[Heavily Obscured] for creatures other than you. A strong wind (like that created by @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGustofWind]{Gust of Wind}) disperses the swarm and ends the effect.

Spells. While holding the staff, you can cast one of the spells on the following table from it, using your spell save DC and spell attack modifier. The table indicates how many charges you must expend to cast the spell.

Spell

Charge Cost

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGiantInsec]{Giant Insect}

4

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInsectPlag]{Insect Plague}

5

Regaining Charges. The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll [[/r 1d20]]. On a 1, a swarm of insects consumes and destroys the staff, then disperses.

FVTT Note: In accordance with Chafkhem's stat block, this weapon has been modified to deal 1d8 bludgeoning, and 3d6 additional necrotic damage. However, this is not an inherent property of this weapon, and only reflects its damage when wielded by Chafkhem himself. If a PC takes and wields this item, ensure that you remove the additional damage accordingly.

Giant Insect.name: 巨虫
Giant Insect.description:
你召唤一只巨化的蜈蚣、蜘蛛或黄蜂（你施法时选择）。其使用下文@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.phbmobGiantInsec]{巨虫}的数据，并会在施法距离内一处你可见的未被占据的空间中显现。你选择的形态决定了其数据中的部分细节。该生物会在生命值降为 0 或是法术结束时消失。

该生物是你和你盟友的盟友。它在战斗中使用你的先攻，并在你回合结束后立即执行其回合。它遵从于你的口头指令（无需任何动作）。如果你不发令，它将执行回避动作并使用其移动力以远离危险。

升环施法：在生物数据中使用更高的法术环阶。

除了在巨虫的特质和动作中使用的法术环阶外，以下属性也受到影响。

巨虫 Giant Insect
护甲等级11 + 法术环阶
生命值30 + 每比 4 环高的法术环阶 10 点
速度40 尺， 攀爬 40 尺， 飞行 40 尺 （仅限黄蜂）
熟练加值等于施法者熟练加值

Insect Plague.name: 疫病虫群
Insect Plague.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并以该点为中心使半径 20 尺的球状区域内堆满成群的噬人蝗虫。虫群使整个区域成为 &Reference[DifficultTerrain] ，且处于 &Reference[LightlyObscured]，在法术终止前都会持续存在。

当虫群显现时，其区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d10 的穿刺伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入该区域内，或者在区域内结束其回合时，也必须进行该豁免。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法：使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: Chafkhem has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Rejuvenation.name: Rejuvenation
Rejuvenation.description: If reduced to 0 Hit Points, Chafkhem gains a new body in 24 hours, regaining all his Hit Points and becoming active again. The new body appears inside his magic circle. This trait doesn’t function if Chafkhem’s magic circle is the target of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHallow0000]{Hallow} spell.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: Chafkhem uses [[/item .SscaMSiGAKicMHdL]] and makes one [[/item .XgRVNTPAyQdUT7uv]] or [[/item .4IeS39F46V6kAORa]] attack. He can replace one attack with a use of [[/item .6MEghn5Y2UB6iYZJ]] .

Rotting Fist.name: 腐朽拳击
Rotting Fist.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

Cursed.name: 诅咒
Cursed.description: 若你为生物，则你被诅咒。受诅咒期间，你无法恢复生命值，也无法在完成长休时恢复生命值上限，并且诅咒每持续 24 小时，你生命值上限降低 [[/r 3d6#减少最大生命值]]{10 (3d6)}。若你因此攻击生命值降至 0，则你立即死亡并化为尘土。

Dreadful Glare.name: 恐怖怒视
Dreadful Glare.description:
Chafkhem targets one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] he can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet of him. If the target can see Chafkhem, it is subjected to the following effect.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]]

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of Chafkhem's next turn. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target also has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false condition for the same duration.

Success: The target is immune to Chafkhem's Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，直到木乃伊的下一回合结束。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
Chafkhem casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplChillTouch], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMessage000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMinorIllus], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTrueStrike]

2/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBlight0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHaste00000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGreaterInv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplTashasHide], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbProtectionFro], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofEnfee], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSeeInvisib], Sage’s Curse, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAnimateObj], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplConeofCold], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplGlobeofInv]

Chill Touch.name: 颤栗之触
Chill Touch.description:
你引导出来自坟墓的刺骨阴冷，对目标进行一次近战法术攻击。命中时，目标将受到 1d10 点暗蚀伤害，并且直至你下一回合的结束前都无法恢复生命值。

戏法强化： 法术的伤害会在你到达下列等级时增加 1d10：5 级（2d10）、11 级（3d10）以及 17 级（4d10）。

Blocked Healing.name: 无法恢复生命值
Blocked Healing.description: 你无法恢复生命值直至施法者的下一回合结束。

Dimensional Escape.name: Dimensional Escape
Dimensional Escape.description: Chafkhem teleports up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Due to the magical protections on area E17, he can’t teleport through that room’s walls or door, but he can teleport within the room and isn’t restricted outside of it.

Warding Script.name: Warding Script
Warding Script.description:
Chafkhem traces a magical glyph in the air that burns brightly and then fades. Each creature that has attacked Chafkhem or targeted him with a spell since the end of Chafkhem’s last turn is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15.

Failure: The creature has the Blinded condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Failure or Success: Chafkhem can’t take this action again until the start of his next turn.

Flickerwisp.name: Flickerwisp
Flickerwisp.description:
The dancing, twisting flickerwisp is a less powerful but no less malevolent type of will-o’-wisp. Like their more dangerous kin, flickerwisps prefer to haunt lonely swamps or stretches of lonely rivers or creeks, particularly near the shorelines where they can pass themselves off as nothing more than a small gathering of fireflies. A flickerwisp’s body is a 3-foot-long length of hair-like fibers that flashes and pulses with ribbons and points of eerie yellow light as the creature flits through the air.

While a flickerwisp can taste fear and finds the flavor delectable, they do not feed on this emotion. Instead, flickerwisps subsist on confusion and doubt. The sense of unease a traveler exudes when they become lost in the woods is flickerwisps’ favorite repast. They can sip from this sense of disorientation without betraying their presence or harming their prey. Eventually, the flickerwisps grow too hungry and are compelled to flit closer, confuse their prey, and glut on the raw emotions. Flickerwisps do their best to swoop away before death occurs, and the most skilled of these tormentors can keep a chosen meal alive for days, sipping from confusion in small doses.

Ephemeral.name: 转瞬即逝
Ephemeral.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t wear or carry anything.

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 5-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 5 feet.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[difficult terrain]. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

Flicker.name: Flicker
Flicker.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] flits in the air around the head of a creature they can see within 5 feet of them.

If the target can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jJIX1MTX6jXn5PNH]].

Failure: The target can’t take Bonus Actions or Reactions until the end of their next turn, and the target rolls [[/r 1d10]] to determine what it does on its next turn:

1. The target doesn’t take an action, and it uses all its movement to move. Roll [[/r 1d4]] for the direction: 1, north; 2, east; 3, south; or 4, west.

2–6. The target doesn’t move or take actions.

7–8. The target doesn’t move, and it takes the Attack action to make one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If none are within reach, the target takes no action.

9–10. The target chooses its behavior.

Consume Confusion.name: Consume Confusion
Consume Confusion.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TbhXaBkYZxNifITO]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=TbhXaBkYZxNifITO]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that is affected by the wisp’s Flicker.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to Psychic damage dealt.

Giant Maggot.name: Giant Maggot
Giant Maggot.description: Giant flies lay their eggs on the bodies of larger monsters or livestock. When they hatch, these eggs release squirming maggots the size of human children, ravenous young who voraciously consume any flesh in the immediate vicinity—typically starting with the body upon which they were born.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape [[/check skill=acr/ath dc=11]]). Until the Grapple ends, the maggot has Advantage on attack rolls against the target.

Regurgitate.name: Regurgitate
Regurgitate.description:
Trigger: The maggot takes damage.

Response: The maggot regurgitates a rancid meal.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the maggot.

Failure: The creature has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of the maggot’s next turn.

Failure or Success: The maggot can’t use Regurgitate again until it spends a Short or Long Rest feeding on carrion.

Gug.name: Gug
Gug.description:
A gug’s most horrid feature is their barrel-shaped head, which splits vertically to reveal numerous rows of sharp, yellow teeth, and an open throat. The eyes on either side of their head-jaw are small but keen. Bony ridges protect their eyes from the frantic flailing of their prey, as they prefers meals of raw and writhing meat over fungi and molds. They grip said prey with powerful arms that split at the elbow into a pair of forearms, giving them four clawed paws. These monstrous brutes are covered with shaggy black fur, often crusted with gore.

Although gugs may seem bestial, they have keen and wicked intellects. Gugs lair far underground, but they sometimes come to the surface to hunt during dark nights, either alone or in small groups. As they possess voracious appetites, most gugs consume the creatures they catch, but some instead kidnap their victims and retreat below the surface, leaving only a lingering stench and odd, clawed paw prints. Victims are taken to rancid lairs marked with strange runes and sacrificed to the gugs’ wicked gods of blood, darkness, and nightmares. Dire rumors tell of lightless gug cities made of titanic blocks of stone far underground, where powerful gug leaders preach their vile doctrines to mobs of howling gugs.

Gugs have a strange relationship with ghouls, which seems to date from their shared origin in a distant subterranean world. Gugs live in fear of ghouls, despite towering over them; however, this strange fear doesn’t apply to ghasts, whom gugs consume as voraciously as they do other creatures.

Gugs stand 16 feet tall and weigh 2,000 pounds, although they have an eerie, graceful gait that belies their immense size. Their light step and ability to squeeze through very small crannies makes gugs common bogeymen in tales of strange disappearances or bloody massacres.

Alien Mind.name: Alien Mind
Alien Mind.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the Charmed or Frightened conditions.

Combat Reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes
Combat Reflexes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has an extra Reaction that can be used only for &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

Eerie Flexibility.name: Eerie Flexibility
Eerie Flexibility.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 2 feet across without expending extra movement to do so.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes five attacks: one with their [[/item Bite]] and four with their [[/item Claws]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t attack a single target with their Claws more than twice on their turn.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Mulventok.name: Mulventok
Mulventok.description:
Dreshkan

246
to their allies. Allies in 30-foot Emanation originating
from the mulventok gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls
and ability checks, provided they don’t oppose the
mulventok’s imprinted goal.

Tamchal Chakram.name: Tamchal Chakram
Tamchal Chakram.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) Slashing damage, plus 3 (1d6) Psychic damage if used to make a ranged attack.

Shield Bash.name: 盾击
Shield Bash.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 16.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Fervent Command.name: Fervent Command
Fervent Command.description: The mulventok barks an order to a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. If that creature can hear the mulventok and doesn’t oppose the mulventok’s imprinted goal, it can use its Reaction to move up to its Speed and make a melee weapon attack. If it does, the creature has Advantage on the attack.

Donate Resolve.name: Donate Resolve
Donate Resolve.description:
Trigger: Damage would reduce a creature the mulventok can see to 0 Hit Points.

Response: The creature is reduced to 1 Hit Point, and the mulventok takes [[/damage 2d6 average psychic]] damage.

Shield.name: 护盾术
Shield.description: 盾牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

Explosive Decay.name: Explosive Decay
Explosive Decay.description:
The mulventok’s mirrored flesh ruptures and explodes when the mulventok dies.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the mulventok.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Psychokinetic Honing.name: Psychokinetic Honing
Psychokinetic Honing.description: When thrown, the mulventok’s weapon deals an additional 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) Psychic damage (included in the attack) and returns to the mulventok’s hand at the end of their turn.

War Leader.name: War Leader
War Leader.description: The mulventok’s very presence is inspiring to their allies. Allies in 30-foot Emanation originating from the mulventok gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and ability checks, provided they don’t oppose the mulventok’s imprinted goal.

Inspired by War Leader.name: Inspired by War Leader
Inspired by War Leader.description: Allies in 30-foot Emanation originating from the mulventok gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and ability checks, provided they don’t oppose the mulventok’s imprinted goal.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The mulventok makes two melee attacks. In place of one attack, they can use [[/item Fervent Command]].
